description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Merlot opens with aromas of bluish-black fruit, toasted oak, espresso and licorice. The palate delivers blackberry extract, anise, clove and tobacco while dusty tannins provide support.
Refined-description: This blend Cabernet Sauvignon Cabernet Franc Merlot open aroma bluishblack fruit toasted oak espresso licorice The palate delivers blackberry extract anise clove tobacco dusty tannin provide support

description: Briary, dry, lightly oaked aromas of plum and berry lead to a bright, forward, juicy palate with fresh acidity and racy flavors of cherry and plum. This is short but clean on the finish, and overall it's the type of simple, drinkable, affordable Ribera del Duero that fans of the region don't come across often enough.
Refined-description: Briary dry lightly oaked aroma plum berry lead bright forward juicy palate fresh acidity racy flavor cherry plum This short clean finish overall type simple drinkable affordable Ribera del Duero fan region nt come across often enough

description: Mineral, citrus and dusty aromas are textbook for brut Cava. A round, full palate shows good grip and acidity, while flavors of lemon-lime and nectarine finish with notes of lime and green banana. Nothing about this is overwhelming, but the sum of its parts add up.
Refined-description: Mineral citrus dusty aroma textbook brut Cava A round full palate show good grip acidity flavor lemonlime nectarine finish note lime green banana Nothing overwhelming sum part add

description: This is an excellent Chardonnay for an accessible price. It's balanced and textured, with bites of apple and anise highlighting the journey. Power and finesse are offered in equal measure. A delicious wine for the table, it will impress with its depth and complexity.
Refined-description: This excellent Chardonnay accessible price It balanced textured bite apple anise highlighting journey Power finesse offered equal measure A delicious wine table impress depth complexity

description: A parcel of old vines in the Brandluft vineyard gives the typical concentration and intense minerality to be expected from low yields. The wine is perfumed, with a bone-dry texture and melon and orange fruitiness. It needs to age, so drink from 2017.
Refined-description: A parcel old vine Brandluft vineyard give typical concentration intense minerality expected low yield The wine perfumed bonedry texture melon orange fruitiness It need age drink 2017

description: Rui Madeira's flagship red is a formidable, powerful wine. It has intense tannins that are surrounded by dark fruits and rich, juicy acidity. The core is dry, concentrated and dense, and the wood aging shows against the background of ripe fruits, promising good aging potential. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: Rui Madeira flagship red formidable powerful wine It intense tannin surrounded dark fruit rich juicy acidity The core dry concentrated dense wood aging show background ripe fruit promising good aging potential Drink 2018

description: Spicy in black plum and berry fruit, Black Chicken is a consistent blockbuster for Biale, alive and fresh in waves of exotic cinnamon and clove. Built to age 2020–2022, it'll satisfy in complex black tea and savory toasty oak, an easy wine to love. The grapes are sourced from the winery's estate sites within the Oak Knoll District, where it's based.
Refined-description: Spicy black plum berry fruit Black Chicken consistent blockbuster Biale alive fresh wave exotic cinnamon clove Built age 2020–2022 satisfy complex black tea savory toasty oak easy wine love The grape sourced winery estate site within Oak Knoll District based

description: Muted black plum teases from the nose of this wine, a blend of 73% Cabernet Sauvignon, 16% Merlot, 8% Cabernet Franc and 3% Petit Verdot. Amidst a wall of dusty tannins still needing time to soften, you'll find clove, blackberry and a treasure trove of chocolate and vanilla.
Refined-description: Muted black plum tease nose wine blend 73 Cabernet Sauvignon 16 Merlot 8 Cabernet Franc 3 Petit Verdot Amidst wall dusty tannin still needing time soften find clove blackberry treasure trove chocolate vanilla

description: From a single-vineyard, estate-grown and bottled, this is an intense 100% Cabernet, generous in roasted plum, cedar and coffee. With supple tannins it's easy to enjoy, concentrated and dark, a good match for roasted meats and savory pies.
Refined-description: From singlevineyard estategrown bottled intense 100 Cabernet generous roasted plum cedar coffee With supple tannin easy enjoy concentrated dark good match roasted meat savory pie

description: Black Eyed Peas singer Fergie and Winemaker Joey Tensley converge on a blend of Syrah, Merlot, Grenache and Cabernet Sauvignon that's worth sitting on until at least 2019. Woody, cigar box aromas pick up notes of camphor and flashes of red fruit, and the flavors fall in line around the cedar, with blueberry, black cherry and milk chocolate.
Refined-description: Black Eyed Peas singer Fergie Winemaker Joey Tensley converge blend Syrah Merlot Grenache Cabernet Sauvignon worth sitting least 2019 Woody cigar box aroma pick note camphor flash red fruit flavor fall line around cedar blueberry black cherry milk chocolate

description: Coming from vines ranging in age from 9–39 years, this is an aromatically complex wine, with notes of wet slate, orange peel and herb. It drinks off dry, with tart, mouthwatering acidity accenting the abundant stone fruit flavors—a thriller of a wine.
designation: Cave Spring Vineyard Estate Bottled VQA
Refined-description: Coming vine ranging age 9–39 year aromatically complex wine note wet slate orange peel herb It drink dry tart mouthwatering acidity accenting abundant stone fruit flavors—a thriller wine

description: Working from an urban winery on Santa Barbara's Eastside, Matthias Pippig created the Loner Chardonnay series. This entry begins with scents of cider, nectarine and lemon-lime soda before delving into a palate laden with yellow fruits and flowers. Sourdough yeastiness surrounds a lingering line of grapefruit zest-led acidity.
Refined-description: Working urban winery Santa Barbara Eastside Matthias Pippig created Loner Chardonnay series This entry begin scent cider nectarine lemonlime soda delving palate laden yellow fruit flower Sourdough yeastiness surround lingering line grapefruit zestled acidity

description: A solid, firm wine with a great rapport between the black berry fruits, juicy acidity and dark tannins. It has a fresh element along with a powerful structure and dense mineral texture. It will age well, so drink from 2017.
Refined-description: A solid firm wine great rapport black berry fruit juicy acidity dark tannin It fresh element along powerful structure dense mineral texture It age well drink 2017

description: This is a rich, full-bodied and wood-aged wine, produced from vines in the village of Panasqueira. It has herbal and mint flavors, with black fruit tones powered by structured tannins. It is impressive, ripe, and still maturing. Best after 2016.
Refined-description: This rich fullbodied woodaged wine produced vine village Panasqueira It herbal mint flavor black fruit tone powered structured tannin It impressive ripe still maturing Best 2016

description: Big points for subtlety, length and elegance here—this is not a wine that will blow you away at first sniff. Stay with it and it stays with you; opening sharp-edged, pungent and slightly grassy, then developing a tightly focused midpalate with pure lime and apple fruit flavors. Accents of mustard greens and white pepper come in as a long, delicate yet detailed finish slowly unfolds.
Refined-description: Big point subtlety length elegance here—this wine blow away first sniff Stay stay opening sharpedged pungent slightly grassy developing tightly focused midpalate pure lime apple fruit flavor Accents mustard green white pepper come long delicate yet detailed finish slowly unfolds

description: Scents of effervescent cherry and mint run with emergent licorice and slate on this wine that proves lithe yet flavorful on the palate. Lovely blackberry flavors and black pepper make for a very balanced bottling that doesn't rely on bombastic power to tell the Syrah story.
Refined-description: Scents effervescent cherry mint run emergent licorice slate wine prof lithe yet flavorful palate Lovely blackberry flavor black pepper make balanced bottling nt rely bombastic power tell Syrah story

description: This single-vineyard wine shows both the warmth of the vintage and the coolness of this site, boasting depth and richness to the fruit flavors while retaining good acidity. It combines notes of apple, peach and lees with light barrel accents—20% new French—and a creamy feel. Enjoy with shrimp stir fried in olive oil for a pairing nirvana.
Refined-description: This singlevineyard wine show warmth vintage coolness site boasting depth richness fruit flavor retaining good acidity It combine note apple peach lee light barrel accents—20 new French—and creamy feel Enjoy shrimp stir fried olive oil pairing nirvana

description: This is rich and full-bodied, a splendid wine with its ripe yellow fruits, intensely aromatic character and a pinch of pepper. Concentrated, it finishes with a light touch of toastiness that hints at the maturity to come. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: This rich fullbodied splendid wine ripe yellow fruit intensely aromatic character pinch pepper Concentrated finish light touch toastiness hint maturity come Drink 2016

description: Part of the impressive series of Jubilée wines that are aged before release, this Hugel Riesling is just getting to maturity with its soft aromatic character, touch of toastiness, and refreshing herbal flavors. It's now ready to drink, although it will be even better from 2016.
Refined-description: Part impressive series Jubilée wine aged release Hugel Riesling getting maturity soft aromatic character touch toastiness refreshing herbal flavor It ready drink although even better 2016

description: This begins with scents of dried orange rinds and mango laced with honey as well as deeper aromas of rocks and savory herbs. A tight lemon acidity runs down the middle of the palate, with yellow flowers, yeast and toasted pine nuts on the side. It's both racy and rounded, and is showing a touch of age.
Refined-description: This begin scent dried orange rind mango laced honey well deeper aroma rock savory herb A tight lemon acidity run middle palate yellow flower yeast toasted pine nut side It racy rounded showing touch age

description: Honeysuckle and jasmine pique interest aromatically before luscious, linear waves of vanilla, caramel and lemon custard graciously interject, buoyed by ample acidity and a lush texture. This Chardonnay offers generous richness alongside high-toned minerality, and is a delicious go-to for buttery lobster dishes.
Refined-description: Honeysuckle jasmine pique interest aromatically luscious linear wave vanilla caramel lemon custard graciously interject buoyed ample acidity lush texture This Chardonnay offer generous richness alongside hightoned minerality delicious goto buttery lobster dish

description: This wine is straw in color, with delightful notes of lemon curds and apricot blossoms. On the palate, freshly picked apricot and Anjou pear provide the core to a slightly spiced backdrop, finishing crisp and clean. Pair this wine with your favorite spicy Asian dish.
Refined-description: This wine straw color delightful note lemon curd apricot blossom On palate freshly picked apricot Anjou pear provide core slightly spiced backdrop finishing crisp clean Pair wine favorite spicy Asian dish

description: An appealing fragrance of red rose and violet mingled with a whiff of baking spices drifts out of the glass. The juicy palate offers crushed Morello cherry, vanilla, licorice and cinnamon alongside firm but fine tannins. It's a balanced, classic Barbaresco.
Refined-description: An appealing fragrance red rose violet mingled whiff baking spice drift glass The juicy palate offer crushed Morello cherry vanilla licorice cinnamon alongside firm fine tannin It balanced classic Barbaresco

description: Abundant flavors combine with a plush texture to make a wine that slowly builds interest from the first sniff to the lingering aftertaste. Hints of vanilla and honeysuckle enhance the vivid apricot flavors, lasting long on the viscous palate and through the finish.
Refined-description: Abundant flavor combine plush texture make wine slowly build interest first sniff lingering aftertaste Hints vanilla honeysuckle enhance vivid apricot flavor lasting long viscous palate finish

description: Red berry, blue lilac, baking spice and Mediterranean herb lead the nose. On the palate, notes of white pepper, sage and tobacco back up the bright red cherry flavors. It's still young, with aggressive tannins and bright acidity. Drink after 2018.
Refined-description: Red berry blue lilac baking spice Mediterranean herb lead nose On palate note white pepper sage tobacco back bright red cherry flavor It still young aggressive tannin bright acidity Drink 2018

description: This special selection, tight-cropped from 30 acres of 100% Merlot, is ripe and rich. This is a smoky and fruity wine, in barrel for 14 months. It has ripe black fruits and rich, dense structure. Spice and toast balance the fruit, giving an impressive sense of generosity. Drink from 2017.
Refined-description: This special selection tightcropped 30 acre 100 Merlot ripe rich This smoky fruity wine barrel 14 month It ripe black fruit rich dense structure Spice toast balance fruit giving impressive sense generosity Drink 2017

description: From a small parcel of land on the slopes of the Serra de Aire hills, this firm textured, cool-climate wine shows structure and depth. The fruit weight is concentrated with plum and juicy black currant flavors, rotating around a dry core of tannins. Age this complex wine and drink after 2015.
Refined-description: From small parcel land slope Serra de Aire hill firm textured coolclimate wine show structure depth The fruit weight concentrated plum juicy black currant flavor rotating around dry core tannin Age complex wine drink 2015

description: The wine is pure minerality, tightly woven into a tense structure and fruits that are still very young. It's complex, allying fruit with a texture that is steely and only developing slowly. It will be impressive as it ages. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: The wine pure minerality tightly woven tense structure fruit still young It complex allying fruit texture steely developing slowly It impressive age Drink 2018

description: The aromas of this Chardonnay are zesty and fresh yet rich, with barrel smoke, caramelized pear and vanilla tones. The integration continues on the palate, with a bit of oak followed by apple, white peach, nectarine and lime zest. It's flavorful and enjoyable now.
Refined-description: The aroma Chardonnay zesty fresh yet rich barrel smoke caramelized pear vanilla tone The integration continues palate bit oak followed apple white peach nectarine lime zest It flavorful enjoyable

description: Deep, pure cassis and red berry aromas are integrated and thorough. This Bordeaux-style blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc and Merlot is racy, tight and hard-driving, with bold berry, pepper, baking spice and chocolate flavors. A toasty, peppery finish is juicy, forward and long. Drink through 2020.
Refined-description: Deep pure cassis red berry aroma integrated thorough This Bordeauxstyle blend Cabernet Sauvignon Petit Verdot Cabernet Franc Merlot racy tight harddriving bold berry pepper baking spice chocolate flavor A toasty peppery finish juicy forward long Drink 2020

description: Winemaker Mark McNeilly from Mark Ryan Winery makes this estate grown Viognier, and works it in the same strong, substantial, concentrated style as his own release. The mix of concrete and neutral oak fermentation brings out some nice floral highlights and a light hint of toast. The length and flavor development through the long finish are exceptional.
Refined-description: Winemaker Mark McNeilly Mark Ryan Winery make estate grown Viognier work strong substantial concentrated style release The mix concrete neutral oak fermentation brings nice floral highlight light hint toast The length flavor development long finish exceptional

description: Unctuous and ripe in caramel and toasty aromas, this is deep golden in color but completely crisp and balanced in the glass. The nose is so overwhelming that the flavors take time to show. Once they do, it's a celebration of green apple and melon enveloped in complex minerality and a supple body.
Refined-description: Unctuous ripe caramel toasty aroma deep golden color completely crisp balanced glass The nose overwhelming flavor take time show Once celebration green apple melon enveloped complex minerality supple body

description: This is a classic version of the varietal, matching complex herb and cherry aromas with fresh, frank fruit flavors that also show hints of mint, clove and anise. It is all about vibrancy and balance, not full body, and has a welcome, appetizing personality.
Refined-description: This classic version varietal matching complex herb cherry aroma fresh frank fruit flavor also show hint mint clove anise It vibrancy balance full body welcome appetizing personality

description: An interesting vein of tasty herb flavor runs through this full-bodied, plump and fruity wine. The aroma has hints of dill and sage, and these mingle with black cherry and blueberry on the palate. A sleek texture and long finish complete the picture.
Refined-description: An interesting vein tasty herb flavor run fullbodied plump fruity wine The aroma hint dill sage mingle black cherry blueberry palate A sleek texture long finish complete picture

description: Kirsten's Feinherb, or gently sweet bottling, maintains a firm foundation of stoniness, but also embraces softer, less angular dimensions of spring blossom and peach. High-toned acidity brighten and lifts the palate through a long finish. Drink now through 2021.
Refined-description: Kirsten Feinherb gently sweet bottling maintains firm foundation stoniness also embrace softer le angular dimension spring blossom peach Hightoned acidity brighten lift palate long finish Drink 2021

description: Situated close to the northern edge of Beaune vineyards, this premier cru has something of the soft ripeness of Savigny-lès-Beaune next door. The wine is ripe, with tannins that are present although certainly not dominant. It has the potential to revel in its red fruits and generous texture. Drink this wine from 2019.
Refined-description: Situated close northern edge Beaune vineyard premier cru something soft ripeness SavignylèsBeaune next door The wine ripe tannin present although certainly dominant It potential revel red fruit generous texture Drink wine 2019

description: This structured wine still has wood aromas although on the palate the rich, dark fruits dominate. The tannins both from wood and from the fruit are firm and still young, showing the possibility of long-term aging. This complex wine should not be drunk before 2019.
Refined-description: This structured wine still wood aroma although palate rich dark fruit dominate The tannin wood fruit firm still young showing possibility longterm aging This complex wine drunk 2019

description: Quite a steal of a deal for a widely available wine, this shows cinnamon, red cherry, ripe cranberry, light tobacco and a touch of leather on the rustic nose. Once sipped, the mouthfeel is soft, offering flavors of cranberry and red cherry that are spiced by thyme, bay leaf and more cinnamon.
Refined-description: Quite steal deal widely available wine show cinnamon red cherry ripe cranberry light tobacco touch leather rustic nose Once sipped mouthfeel soft offering flavor cranberry red cherry spiced thyme bay leaf cinnamon

description: Hazelnut and truffle compete for affection in this juicy, rounded, lovable wine, a full-bodied and structured example from the appellation, known for its at-times generous portrait of tannin and wound-up concentration.
Refined-description: Hazelnut truffle compete affection juicy rounded lovable wine fullbodied structured example appellation known attimes generous portrait tannin woundup concentration

description: Luscious white peach and apricot flavors are anchored by a steely core of mineral in this easy-drinking but elegant wine. Light bodied but persistent, it's a lip-smacking, sweet wine that finishes with a touch of brambly herbaceousness. Drink now through 2020.
Refined-description: Luscious white peach apricot flavor anchored steely core mineral easydrinking elegant wine Light bodied persistent lipsmacking sweet wine finish touch brambly herbaceousness Drink 2020

description: Aromas like wild berries and sage lead to moderate cherry and raspberry flavors in this medium-bodied wine. With each sip the fruit flavor seems to deepen and the finish seems to lengthen because of the wine's strong concentration and lively texture with just the right amount of tannin.
Refined-description: Aromas like wild berry sage lead moderate cherry raspberry flavor mediumbodied wine With sip fruit flavor seems deepen finish seems lengthen wine strong concentration lively texture right amount tannin

description: This offers heady aromas of honeysuckle, white stone fruit, dill, hay and a vegetal note that recalls tomato leaf. The tangy palate offers juicy grapefruit, white peach and honeydew melon while mouthwatering salinity provides depth.
Refined-description: This offer heady aroma honeysuckle white stone fruit dill hay vegetal note recall tomato leaf The tangy palate offer juicy grapefruit white peach honeydew melon mouthwatering salinity provides depth

description: Aromas of this wine show considerable wood. On the palate, the wood is very present, giving acidity as well as layers of toast and spice. Hints of yellow fruit show through, suggesting the possibility of a ripe, rich wine in the future. Drink from 2019.
Refined-description: Aromas wine show considerable wood On palate wood present giving acidity well layer toast spice Hints yellow fruit show suggesting possibility ripe rich wine future Drink 2019

description: A soft, stony scent of pebble and the faintest melon signals a fresh, clean wine. The palate plays these aromas out softly but also with precision. That stoniness lingers on the dry, gentle finish and the lasting flavor of fresh apple peel
Refined-description: A soft stony scent pebble faintest melon signal fresh clean wine The palate play aroma softly also precision That stoniness lingers dry gentle finish lasting flavor fresh apple peel

description: With tannins and new-wood flavors, this rich wine is also structured. A smoky character from the wood is shot through by perfumed red fruits. The aftertaste shows more of the wood flavors that need to integrate. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: With tannin newwood flavor rich wine also structured A smoky character wood shot perfumed red fruit The aftertaste show wood flavor need integrate Drink 2018

description: Subtle hints of ripe, winter-stored apple on the nose lead to an equally apple-dominated palate that shows soft pepper spice. A wonderful midpalate texture and baked-apple richness are countered by lemon freshness. This is very appetizing and cries out for soft cheeses.
Refined-description: Subtle hint ripe winterstored apple nose lead equally appledominated palate show soft pepper spice A wonderful midpalate texture bakedapple richness countered lemon freshness This appetizing cry soft cheese

description: White summer blossoms and ripe green pears make for a fresh scent. The palate lifts these notions with bright lemon acidity. All is buoyed by some residual carbon dioxide. Drink soon while this is at its aromatic height.
Refined-description: White summer blossom ripe green pear make fresh scent The palate lift notion bright lemon acidity All buoyed residual carbon dioxide Drink soon aromatic height

description: This is a sophisticated blend of tart yellow fruits with hints of cucumber, salad greens and lemon oil. Though 80% stainless steel fermented, the rest spent time in new oak. The mineral rich acids provide extra grip.
Refined-description: This sophisticated blend tart yellow fruit hint cucumber salad green lemon oil Though 80 stainless steel fermented rest spent time new oak The mineral rich acid provide extra grip

description: Made entirely with Nero d'Avola, this offers aromas of black-skinned fruit, tilled earth and cake spice. The concentrated but also focused palate shows ripe black cherry and crushed raspberry while nutmeg and carob add depth. Lithe tannins and lively acidity provide the framework.
Refined-description: Made entirely Nero dAvola offer aroma blackskinned fruit tilled earth cake spice The concentrated also focused palate show ripe black cherry crushed raspberry nutmeg carob add depth Lithe tannin lively acidity provide framework

description: This youthful wine is shyer on the nose than its 2013 counterpart, but is still in development, revealing a complex and layered richness of red cherry and berry, as well as dried herb and lavender.
Refined-description: This youthful wine shyer nose 2013 counterpart still development revealing complex layered richness red cherry berry well dried herb lavender

description: Here's a lively Moscato made in a dry style that opens with heady scents of jasmine, citrus blossom and yellow stone fruit aromas. The vibrant palate tastes of apricot, tangerine zest and a note of botanical herb alongside fresh acidity.
Refined-description: Here lively Moscato made dry style open heady scent jasmine citrus blossom yellow stone fruit aroma The vibrant palate taste apricot tangerine zest note botanical herb alongside fresh acidity

description: Crisp acidity and a gorgeous, aromatic nose lead on this elegant white. Though mineral-driven, it offers generous white peach and grapefruit flavors that will pair well with fuller-bodied fish. Impressive and versatile.
Refined-description: Crisp acidity gorgeous aromatic nose lead elegant white Though mineraldriven offer generous white peach grapefruit flavor pair well fullerbodied fish Impressive versatile

description: Among the well-differentiated single vineyard selections from Soléna in 2014, this may be the most instantly enjoyable. It's a big, mouth-coating wine, a full-flavored burst of chocolate-covered cherries. Lighter notes of coffee and tobacco filter in through the extended finish.
Refined-description: Among welldifferentiated single vineyard selection Soléna 2014 may instantly enjoyable It big mouthcoating wine fullflavored burst chocolatecovered cherry Lighter note coffee tobacco filter extended finish

description: The oak in this wine is restrained, partly because it aged in stainless steel and a sizable percentage of neutral oak. Still, a richness of apple and pear compote provide a steady level of richness, while a lemon squeeze of acidity keeps it fresh and youthful.
Refined-description: The oak wine restrained partly aged stainless steel sizable percentage neutral oak Still richness apple pear compote provide steady level richness lemon squeeze acidity keep fresh youthful

description: Aromas of iris, rose, dark-skinned berry and a whiff of baking spice lead nose. The juicy, easy-drinking palate doles out fleshy wild cherry, black raspberry and black pepper alongside bright acidity and supple tannins. Chill this down for the perfect summer red.
Refined-description: Aromas iris rose darkskinned berry whiff baking spice lead nose The juicy easydrinking palate dole fleshy wild cherry black raspberry black pepper alongside bright acidity supple tannin Chill perfect summer red

description: Seductive, spicy oak in the aromas and flavors puts a great spin on this medium-bodied, velvety smooth wine from a promising new winery in Northern California. Some ripe black-cherry and cranberry flavors chime in as well, supporting the toasted baguette, cedar and nutmeg nuances and layering seamlessly.
Refined-description: Seductive spicy oak aroma flavor put great spin mediumbodied velvety smooth wine promising new winery Northern California Some ripe blackcherry cranberry flavor chime well supporting toasted baguette cedar nutmeg nuance layering seamlessly

description: Baked, rooty aromas of sandalwood, exotic spices and berry fruits are attractive. Though slightly grabby on the palate, this shows the right structure and build. Flavors of up-front oak, herbal plum and raspberry finish dry, with firm, pinching tannins. Drink through 2021.
Refined-description: Baked rooty aroma sandalwood exotic spice berry fruit attractive Though slightly grabby palate show right structure build Flavors upfront oak herbal plum raspberry finish dry firm pinching tannin Drink 2021

description: Berry and cinnamon aromas are lightly woody and spicy. This is tannic but not mean or fierce. Flavors of oaky plum and berry fruits turn savory in front of a finish with a dry, snappy, slightly raw feel. Given that 2013 was a cold vintage, this Crianza deserves praise.
Refined-description: Berry cinnamon aroma lightly woody spicy This tannic mean fierce Flavors oaky plum berry fruit turn savory front finish dry snappy slightly raw feel Given 2013 cold vintage Crianza deserves praise

description: This full-bodied wine combines deep, ripe fruit flavors, light spicy accents and a very firm mouthfeel that begs for a bite of a grilled rosemary lamb chop. The wine pushes the stereotype of wimpy Merlot out of the way and does it with fruit concentration rather than obvious oak. Drink through 2020.
Refined-description: This fullbodied wine combine deep ripe fruit flavor light spicy accent firm mouthfeel begs bite grilled rosemary lamb chop The wine push stereotype wimpy Merlot way fruit concentration rather obvious oak Drink 2020

description: Apple, pear and stone-fruit flavors are vibrant and fresh from nose to finish of this delicately sweet Kabinett. It offers uncomplicated refreshment, but is anchored with taut acidity and honed, steely minerality. The finish is long and persistent.
Refined-description: Apple pear stonefruit flavor vibrant fresh nose finish delicately sweet Kabinett It offer uncomplicated refreshment anchored taut acidity honed steely minerality The finish long persistent

description: A slightly herbal, minty character gives personality to this full-bodied, generous and richly textured wine. It is attractively dry, nicely tannic, layered with black cherry, wild berry and rosemary notes. Great to drink now through 2020 with rich meats or mushrooms.
Refined-description: A slightly herbal minty character give personality fullbodied generous richly textured wine It attractively dry nicely tannic layered black cherry wild berry rosemary note Great drink 2020 rich meat mushroom

description: An ambitious, concentrated, but not oaky wine, this has a very dark color, aromas of black cherries, and ripe but dry flavors of blackberries and dark chocolate. It is medium to full bodied, framed by lots of fine-grained tannins and finishing with more dark fruit. It's a good wine to lay down and drink after 2019.
Refined-description: An ambitious concentrated oaky wine dark color aroma black cherry ripe dry flavor blackberry dark chocolate It medium full bodied framed lot finegrained tannin finishing dark fruit It good wine lay drink 2019

description: Cherry pie and nuanced spice flavors buoy this delicately layered, medium-bodied vineyard designate that's built of robust fruit and supported quietly by oak. A thread of white pepper persists throughout, making it especially irresistible.
Refined-description: Cherry pie nuanced spice flavor buoy delicately layered mediumbodied vineyard designate built robust fruit supported quietly oak A thread white pepper persists throughout making especially irresistible

description: An aromatic textural wine, Wichmann sources fruit from the winery's oldest vines. Strawberry and cherry flavors are woven into details of citrus and tea. This elegant well-proportioned effort provides a feminine contrast to the sturdy Coast Range bottling.
Refined-description: An aromatic textural wine Wichmann source fruit winery oldest vine Strawberry cherry flavor woven detail citrus tea This elegant wellproportioned effort provides feminine contrast sturdy Coast Range bottling

description: This is the home estate of Madiran superstar Alain Brumont. The wine is big, bold, rich and packed with both fruit and tannins. It has great structure and a dense dusty tannic character that promises great aging. This is a major wine that needs time. Drink it starting from 2022.
Refined-description: This home estate Madiran superstar Alain Brumont The wine big bold rich packed fruit tannin It great structure dense dusty tannic character promise great aging This major wine need time Drink starting 2022

description: This tremendous red wine is robustly aromatic, layering its black currant, dark cherry and chocolate scents with dusty sage and cedar. Luxuriously textured and smooth, it finishes focused and direct, with a lift of welcome acidity and complexity.
Refined-description: This tremendous red wine robustly aromatic layering black currant dark cherry chocolate scent dusty sage cedar Luxuriously textured smooth finish focused direct lift welcome acidity complexity

description: From a cool part of the Napa Valley, this wine is bright and medium bodied—a moderately oaked mix of lemon custard, floral citrus and green apple flavors with an underlying spark of lemongrass and ginger. Richly layered, it remains balanced and structured as it opens in the glass.
Refined-description: From cool part Napa Valley wine bright medium bodied—a moderately oaked mix lemon custard floral citrus green apple flavor underlying spark lemongrass ginger Richly layered remains balanced structured open glass

description: Many are now playing with the low-alcohol, nervy side of Chardonnay, but Doug Margerum succeeds more than most. This bottling is light in the glass, with clean and crisp Asian pear, nectarine and mandarin pith aromas. The palate is tightly wound and energetic, showing sharp citrus and rounded strone-fruit flavors. Drink now–2030.
Refined-description: Many playing lowalcohol nervy side Chardonnay Doug Margerum succeeds This bottling light glass clean crisp Asian pear nectarine mandarin pith aroma The palate tightly wound energetic showing sharp citrus rounded stronefruit flavor Drink now–2030

description: One of the finest whites of the vintage, this exquisite bottling has an enticing bouquet of almond, orchard fruit, almond and chopped herb. The elegantly structured palate delivers mouthwatering peach, apricot, almond and energizing mineral ntoes that carry over to the long, lingering finish, along with a hint of tangerine.
Refined-description: One finest white vintage exquisite bottling enticing bouquet almond orchard fruit almond chopped herb The elegantly structured palate delivers mouthwatering peach apricot almond energizing mineral ntoes carry long lingering finish along hint tangerine

description: Eight years is about right for a Madiran to start its mature phase. This wine is just there, a ripe expression of Tannat. It still has tannins and they will remain, but the fruit has lost its raw youth and has become rich with dried fruits and acidity working well together. Drink this wine now and until 2025.
Refined-description: Eight year right Madiran start mature phase This wine ripe expression Tannat It still tannin remain fruit lost raw youth become rich dried fruit acidity working well together Drink wine 2025

description: This lovely, layered wine from the Santa Ynez Valley-based producer shows iron, cranberry, shiitake, cola and cherry on the nose. Those same elements are delicately woven into the palate, enhanced by a Sichuan peppercorn kick and vibrant acidity that will ensure a long life ahead. Its flavors continue to unwind as it opens in the glass.
Refined-description: This lovely layered wine Santa Ynez Valleybased producer show iron cranberry shiitake cola cherry nose Those element delicately woven palate enhanced Sichuan peppercorn kick vibrant acidity ensure long life ahead Its flavor continue unwind open glass

description: Aromatically compelling, this offers a complex mix of clover, chocolate and cherry in the nose. It is a substantial, fruit-packed wine, with cherry and plum fruit, a full-bodied midpalate, mouthfilling texture and nicely integrated barrel spices. It finishes with a streak of Meyer lemon acidity. Drink now through 2030.
Refined-description: Aromatically compelling offer complex mix clover chocolate cherry nose It substantial fruitpacked wine cherry plum fruit fullbodied midpalate mouthfilling texture nicely integrated barrel spice It finish streak Meyer lemon acidity Drink 2030

description: Produced from old Malbec vines in the second terrace above the River Lot, the wine is darkly concentrated, with solid tannins and generous black fruits. Aging for 12 months has smoothed the square corners to create a wine that is hugely rich and rounded. It has the potential to age and become more opulent. Drink from 2020.
Refined-description: Produced old Malbec vine second terrace River Lot wine darkly concentrated solid tannin generous black fruit Aging 12 month smoothed square corner create wine hugely rich rounded It potential age become opulent Drink 2020

description: Cloudy, pungent and supremely earthy, this wine reveals its delicate acidity over time, bringing balance to its flamboyant fruit. With intense strawberry, orange peel and black tea flavors, it's savory and richly built, finishing on a touch of smoky vanilla.
Refined-description: Cloudy pungent supremely earthy wine reveals delicate acidity time bringing balance flamboyant fruit With intense strawberry orange peel black tea flavor savory richly built finishing touch smoky vanilla

description: Pepper and cinnamon strike first, before beautifully aromatic notions of blueberry, plum and tart black cherry appear. These scented fruits pervade the entire palate with spice, verve and freshness. A wonderfully poised Sankt Laurent at the perfect intersection of restrained freshness and glorious richness.
Refined-description: Pepper cinnamon strike first beautifully aromatic notion blueberry plum tart black cherry appear These scented fruit pervade entire palate spice verve freshness A wonderfully poised Sankt Laurent perfect intersection restrained freshness glorious richness

description: High-toned aromas of cranberry, herb, black licorice and dried cherry are followed by tightly wound dark-fruit flavors backed by firm tannins. The finish extends into the distance. It's a highly structured wine, with its best days far in front of it. Best from 2021 through 2027.
Refined-description: Hightoned aroma cranberry herb black licorice dried cherry followed tightly wound darkfruit flavor backed firm tannin The finish extends distance It highly structured wine best day far front Best 2021 2027

description: Complemented with 11% Cabernet Franc, this vineyard designate from winemaker Jesse Katz shines in fragrant plum, raspberry and blackberry flavors. Softly layered and balanced, it teases with dark chocolate and clove hints.
Refined-description: Complemented 11 Cabernet Franc vineyard designate winemaker Jesse Katz shine fragrant plum raspberry blackberry flavor Softly layered balanced tease dark chocolate clove hint

description: Baked red cherry, vanilla pastry, loam, dried mint and forest floor notes all show in this excellent bottling from Bryan Babcock's family vineyard. Its tannic structure is immediately apparent, framing a core of raspberry fruit rounded out with thyme, oregano, black pepper and sea salt flavors. Drink 2021–2029.
Refined-description: Baked red cherry vanilla pastry loam dried mint forest floor note show excellent bottling Bryan Babcock family vineyard Its tannic structure immediately apparent framing core raspberry fruit rounded thyme oregano black pepper sea salt flavor Drink 2021–2029

description: Deep dark berry aromas come with notes of vanilla, gritty spice and tobacco. Hard tannins require cushion and this has just enough to handle things. Blackberry, cassis, barrel spice and molasses flavors finish with savory oak notes, chocolate and lingering blackberry fruit. Drink through 2030.
Refined-description: Deep dark berry aroma come note vanilla gritty spice tobacco Hard tannin require cushion enough handle thing Blackberry cassis barrel spice molasses flavor finish savory oak note chocolate lingering blackberry fruit Drink 2030

description: Juicy, vivid black cherry fruit appears on the nose of this wine, with a touch of tar and brooding elderberry. The palate brims with those appetizing flavors and adds an edge of licorice to the fruit. It's fresh and vibrant, with a fine, taut, gossamer structure. A delicious Pinot Noir that's as elegant as it is refreshing and honest.
Refined-description: Juicy vivid black cherry fruit appears nose wine touch tar brooding elderberry The palate brim appetizing flavor add edge licorice fruit It fresh vibrant fine taut gossamer structure A delicious Pinot Noir elegant refreshing honest

description: Upon first pour, this only shows some earthy hints of evolution. With air, the aromas awaken and lovely notes hayflower notes emerge. The palate is laced with elderberry and dried oak leaf flavors and framed by smooth tannins. Just a little bottle age has given this an almost timeless elegance, proving a wine doesn't need power to shine, just depth. Drink now–2025.
Refined-description: Upon first pour show earthy hint evolution With air aroma awaken lovely note hayflower note emerge The palate laced elderberry dried oak leaf flavor framed smooth tannin Just little bottle age given almost timeless elegance proving wine nt need power shine depth Drink now–2025

description: This bottling reveals that this historic vineyard can produce incredibly rich wine as well as the zestier styles it is known for. It shows black cherry, candied strawberry and bourbon-like spice on the nose. The mouthfeel is lavish, full of purple fruit and floral flavors, as well as peppery spice and vanilla warmth. The acidity and structure are solid, and there's a touch of tar on the finish.
Refined-description: This bottling reveals historic vineyard produce incredibly rich wine well zestier style known It show black cherry candied strawberry bourbonlike spice nose The mouthfeel lavish full purple fruit floral flavor well peppery spice vanilla warmth The acidity structure solid touch tar finish

description: Crisp with peach and apricot goodness, this full-bodied white's gravelly texture works to its advantage, providing both steely acidity and grip. That grit becomes velvety smooth as the wine opens in the glass, making it irresistibly seductive and inviting.
Refined-description: Crisp peach apricot goodness fullbodied white gravelly texture work advantage providing steely acidity grip That grit becomes velvety smooth wine open glass making irresistibly seductive inviting

description: Fruit from the oldest blocks in this pioneering vineyard is sourced here. It's bright, spicy and focused, with forward citrus-scented Bing cherry flavors. The concentration and length are outstanding, with just the lightest suggestion of green herbs rounding out the finish.
Refined-description: Fruit oldest block pioneering vineyard sourced It bright spicy focused forward citrusscented Bing cherry flavor The concentration length outstanding lightest suggestion green herb rounding finish

description: Bright, firmly structured and full of classic berry and savory flavors, this wine is rich but balanced and ready to serve with a steak, chop or rack for a special occasion. It has ripe fruit bolstered by firm acidity and a healthy coating of fine-grained, grippy tannins. Best after 2020.
Refined-description: Bright firmly structured full classic berry savory flavor wine rich balanced ready serve steak chop rack special occasion It ripe fruit bolstered firm acidity healthy coating finegrained grippy tannin Best 2020

description: Grown against all odds (and against all likelihood of economic viability) overlooking the Pacific Ocean atop Catalina Island, this Chardonnay is a success every vintage. It shows a broad spectrum of nutty aromas, from macadamia to cashew, with touches of honey and daffodil. On the palate, expect walnut, vanilla and oak smoke, with a butterscotch-like finish.
Refined-description: Grown odds likelihood economic viability overlooking Pacific Ocean atop Catalina Island Chardonnay success every vintage It show broad spectrum nutty aroma macadamia cashew touch honey daffodil On palate expect walnut vanilla oak smoke butterscotchlike finish

description: Another beauty from this producer and this appellation, Hughes is about granite-like minerality and rocky dust—a big-boned powerhouse from a powerful vintage that boasts generous spiced plum, cola, clove and black pepper flavors.
Refined-description: Another beauty producer appellation Hughes granitelike minerality rocky dust—a bigboned powerhouse powerful vintage boast generous spiced plum cola clove black pepper flavor

description: Oak leaf, tart strawberry and supple vanilla aromas appear immediately on the nose and continue their smooth interplay on the mellow palate. This is pliable in texture but has depth, backbone and inherent freshness. Delicious now, it has an underlying taut structure that will benefit from some bottle age. Drink 2018–2025.
Refined-description: Oak leaf tart strawberry supple vanilla aroma appear immediately nose continue smooth interplay mellow palate This pliable texture depth backbone inherent freshness Delicious underlying taut structure benefit bottle age Drink 2018–2025

description: A collaboration between Sonoma County-based winemaker Jesse Katz and Ken Forrester of South Africa, this 100% varietal red is robust and rich. Dark cherry, red currant and integrated oak flavors support its bold body.
designation: A Ken Forrester Wine Farrow Ranch
Refined-description: A collaboration Sonoma Countybased winemaker Jesse Katz Ken Forrester South Africa 100 varietal red robust rich Dark cherry red currant integrated oak flavor support bold body

description: This distinctive, complex and layered wine brings a unique aromatic profile of raspberries, sage and spice before fanning out across the palate with gorgeous raspberry syrup, dark chocolate and blackberry flavors. Its lightly grippy texture of fine-grained tannins perfectly counters the plush effusiveness of its fruit.
Refined-description: This distinctive complex layered wine brings unique aromatic profile raspberry sage spice fanning across palate gorgeous raspberry syrup dark chocolate blackberry flavor Its lightly grippy texture finegrained tannin perfectly counter plush effusiveness fruit

description: Like it's bigger sibling El Anejón, this Reserva from a warm vintage is almost one-quarter Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot in addition to Tinto Fino (Tempranillo). The opening of burnt earth, brandied cherry, rubber and herbal aromas is distinct. This feels a bit tough and chewy, with boysenberry, cassis, vanilla-cream and herbal spice flavors. A fairly smooth finish is young and vital. This should improve with aging. Best from 2019–2026.
Refined-description: Like bigger sibling El Anejón Reserva warm vintage almost onequarter Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot addition Tinto Fino Tempranillo The opening burnt earth brandied cherry rubber herbal aroma distinct This feel bit tough chewy boysenberry cassis vanillacream herbal spice flavor A fairly smooth finish young vital This improve aging Best 2019–2026

description: A structured and still young wine from the estate owned by the Tari family, formerly of Château Giscours in Margaux. It is packed with black fruits, spice and dense tannins that are melding together so well. Licorice and wood aging give the wine an extra complex dimension. Drink this from 2019.
Refined-description: A structured still young wine estate owned Tari family formerly Château Giscours Margaux It packed black fruit spice dense tannin melding together well Licorice wood aging give wine extra complex dimension Drink 2019

description: Hendry Vineyard Zinfandels are among Napa's best. With this release, Rock Wall brings their high alcohol, lusty touch to the wine. It's a huge Zin, dry and tannic, with ripe blackberry, dark chocolate and crushed black peppercorn flavors. Drink it now and through 2021.
Refined-description: Hendry Vineyard Zinfandels among Napa best With release Rock Wall brings high alcohol lusty touch wine It huge Zin dry tannic ripe blackberry dark chocolate crushed black peppercorn flavor Drink 2021

description: This estate-grown, organic Chardonnay is a terrific value, detailed and brightly fruity, with precise angles and spicy details. The apple/pear/pineapple fruit flavors are crisply defined, perfectly ripe, and beautifully balanced.
Refined-description: This estategrown organic Chardonnay terrific value detailed brightly fruity precise angle spicy detail The applepearpineapple fruit flavor crisply defined perfectly ripe beautifully balanced

description: The wine is a successful blend of various mountain vineyards. It's a classic California Cab, rich in tannins, with brisk acidity and finely-etched black currant, cassis, mineral and oak flavors. Blended with some Merlot, it's fancy and elegant, a real beauty to drink now, and will hold in the bottle until 2024.
Refined-description: The wine successful blend various mountain vineyard It classic California Cab rich tannin brisk acidity finelyetched black currant cassis mineral oak flavor Blended Merlot fancy elegant real beauty drink hold bottle 2024

description: With strong wood-aging flavors, this is a full, very ripe and concentrated wine. Coming from old vines, it has depth of flavor, both fruity and rich. Peach and pear flavors dominate, along with spice from wood aging. The wine needs some aging, so drink from 2015.
designation: Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas Reserva
Refined-description: With strong woodaging flavor full ripe concentrated wine Coming old vine depth flavor fruity rich Peach pear flavor dominate along spice wood aging The wine need aging drink 2015

description: Intense aromas recall fragrant jasmine and honeysuckle alongside whiffs of exotic fruit. The round palate delivers juicy green apple, citrus and hints of yellow peach that end on a mineral note.
Refined-description: Intense aroma recall fragrant jasmine honeysuckle alongside whiff exotic fruit The round palate delivers juicy green apple citrus hint yellow peach end mineral note

description: Right out of the bottle, it's all about acidity and fresh, primary raspberry and cherry jam fruit. Wait until 2018 allow more complex mushroom flavors to emerge, as the wine gradually sheds tannins and develops secondary bottle notes.
Refined-description: Right bottle acidity fresh primary raspberry cherry jam fruit Wait 2018 allow complex mushroom flavor emerge wine gradually shed tannin develops secondary bottle note

description: Whiffs of spice, honeycomb and lanolin meld curiously on the nose of this intensely mineral Riesling. Dry in style, with pretty yellow-cherry flavor, it builds in concentration and complexity as shades of spice, rock and fruit amass against a backdrop of sunny tangerine acidity. Drink now.
Refined-description: Whiffs spice honeycomb lanolin meld curiously nose intensely mineral Riesling Dry style pretty yellowcherry flavor build concentration complexity shade spice rock fruit amass backdrop sunny tangerine acidity Drink

description: This dainty off-dry Riesling is marked by aromas—ripe stone fruit and florals against a backdrop of tea leaves and crushed minerals. On the palate, it's intensely juicy, with flavors of orange, mango and peach, but with a streak of acidity that ripples the tongue.
Refined-description: This dainty offdry Riesling marked aromas—ripe stone fruit florals backdrop tea leaf crushed mineral On palate intensely juicy flavor orange mango peach streak acidity ripple tongue

description: Lavish aromas of ripe peach, canteloupe and honeysuckle extend onto the palate of this juicy, fruit-forward Riesling. Semi-sweet in style, it's one lipsmacking nectar, with bracing lime acidity on the finish.
Refined-description: Lavish aroma ripe peach canteloupe honeysuckle extend onto palate juicy fruitforward Riesling Semisweet style one lipsmacking nectar bracing lime acidity finish

description: Zesty lime and evergreen notes mingle with luscious peach, plum and cherry aromas on this semisweet Scheurebe. The palate is juicy in stone fruit flavor, but refreshing and cool, with a bracing hit of acidity that lingers on the finish.
Refined-description: Zesty lime evergreen note mingle luscious peach plum cherry aroma semisweet Scheurebe The palate juicy stone fruit flavor refreshing cool bracing hit acidity lingers finish

description: Smoke and jasmine-tea notes mingle seductively on this brisk, gorgeously floral off-dry Riesling. The palate is lush, with ripe peach and nectarine flavors that fill the mouth, finishing long.
Refined-description: Smoke jasminetea note mingle seductively brisk gorgeously floral offdry Riesling The palate lush ripe peach nectarine flavor fill mouth finishing long

description: This smooth, richly textured wine offers concentrated sensations of exotic fruit, apricot, smoky mineral, golden apple, hazelnut and a hint of honey. The palate is brightened by crisp acidity that gives a crisp finish. This will develop more complexity over the next few years. Drink now–2017.
Refined-description: This smooth richly textured wine offer concentrated sensation exotic fruit apricot smoky mineral golden apple hazelnut hint honey The palate brightened crisp acidity give crisp finish This develop complexity next year Drink now–2017

description: From the estate vineyard, this is thick with spicy flavors of fresh-cut pear. There's a hint of butter and a slightly minty aspect. All in all it's complex, rich and inviting, with penetrating acidity.
Refined-description: From estate vineyard thick spicy flavor freshcut pear There hint butter slightly minty aspect All complex rich inviting penetrating acidity

description: This wine is full of fruit, dusty tannins and great structure. A smooth surface covers the complex, juicy black fruits, dense tannins and mineral texture. This wine will certainly age, so don't drink before 2017.
Refined-description: This wine full fruit dusty tannin great structure A smooth surface cover complex juicy black fruit dense tannin mineral texture This wine certainly age nt drink 2017

description: This Chardonnay is rich in all the bells and whistles, such as aging on the lees in French oak barrels. The underlying fruit shows ripe, racy tropical flavors, as well as peach and pear notes that are deep and delicious. With production of 8,400 cases, the wine should be easy to find.
Refined-description: This Chardonnay rich bell whistle aging lee French oak barrel The underlying fruit show ripe racy tropical flavor well peach pear note deep delicious With production 8400 case wine easy find

description: Still young, it has dense tannins, spice from wood aging and a smoky bacon flavor that is still integrating. It will have the right weight and good berry fruits as it ages, giving a sense of presence and grandeur. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: Still young dense tannin spice wood aging smoky bacon flavor still integrating It right weight good berry fruit age giving sense presence grandeur Drink 2018

description: This wine is as dry as Chardonnay gets, almost severe, with the alcohol an amazingly low 13.2% by volume. The lean, angular mouthfeel provides hints of Meyer lemons, limes and wet stones, with a bit of tropical fruits suggesting that this is California, despite the vintage being the chilliest in memory. Drink it through 2020, but never too cold.
Refined-description: This wine dry Chardonnay get almost severe alcohol amazingly low 132 volume The lean angular mouthfeel provides hint Meyer lemon lime wet stone bit tropical fruit suggesting California despite vintage chilliest memory Drink 2020 never cold

description: The blend is Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Merlot and Malbec. Cab Sauv brings rich black currants, as well as thick tannins. Merlot adds softer notes of cherries and violets. The Malbec increases the tannins, along with notes of grilled meat bone that Syrah, with its peppery, beef-jerky meatiness, enhances. The result is a young, vigorous wine, dry and balanced in acidity. It may or may not age, but there's no reason not to decant it now and enjoy with grilled beefsteak.
Refined-description: The blend Cabernet Sauvignon Syrah Merlot Malbec Cab Sauv brings rich black currant well thick tannin Merlot add softer note cherry violet The Malbec increase tannin along note grilled meat bone Syrah peppery beefjerky meatiness enhances The result young vigorous wine dry balanced acidity It may may age reason decant enjoy grilled beefsteak

description: Here's a big Pinot Noir, dark, dense and tannic. In part, those tannins are due to 30% whole-cluster fermentation, which also gives the wine a brooding earthiness and spiciness. Fully dry, it's packed with black cherry, rhubarb and pomegranate fruits. Hold it until 2018 and see how it's doing.
Refined-description: Here big Pinot Noir dark dense tannic In part tannin due 30 wholecluster fermentation also give wine brooding earthiness spiciness Fully dry packed black cherry rhubarb pomegranate fruit Hold 2018 see

description: Ripe, juicy peaches and nectarines burst from the nose and palate of this semisweet Riesling. Sunny and pristine, with a soft, lacy sweetness, it's balanced by bristling acidity and a delicate minerality on the finish.
Refined-description: Ripe juicy peach nectarine burst nose palate semisweet Riesling Sunny pristine soft lacy sweetness balanced bristling acidity delicate minerality finish

description: Fresh, herbaceous notes on the nose and palate lend elegance to this rich, round Riesling, full of sweet canteloupe and peach flavors. It's delicately structured, with a zingy strike of citrus acidity and hints of spice that carry long on the finish.
Refined-description: Fresh herbaceous note nose palate lend elegance rich round Riesling full sweet canteloupe peach flavor It delicately structured zingy strike citrus acidity hint spice carry long finish

description: This semisweet Riesling balances an intensely fruit-forward profile of ripe yellow cherry and quince flavors against a backdrop of crisp, tart tangerine acidity. It's sunny and bright, yet elegantly composed, with a bristle of fresh herb notes that linger on the finish.
Refined-description: This semisweet Riesling balance intensely fruitforward profile ripe yellow cherry quince flavor backdrop crisp tart tangerine acidity It sunny bright yet elegantly composed bristle fresh herb note linger finish

description: Opening with aromatic notes of smoke against a backdrop of stone fruit and apple blossoms, this is a racy little Riesling that packs a powerful punch of flavor. Delicately sweet, with a saturated palate of yellow cherry and quince, it's smartly balanced by a sheen of minerals and brisk, bracing citrus acidity.
designation: Bernkasteler alte Badstube am Doctorberg Kabinett
Refined-description: Opening aromatic note smoke backdrop stone fruit apple blossom racy little Riesling pack powerful punch flavor Delicately sweet saturated palate yellow cherry quince smartly balanced sheen mineral brisk bracing citrus acidity

description: Wisps of smoke and candle wax seem savory in contrast to the ripe stone fruit and lemon aromas on this concentrated Riesling. Ripe, juicy tangerine flavors lend sweetness to the palate, but are cut with a vein of lime acidity that reverberates from start to finish. It's delicately textured, yet chock full of vibe and zest.
Refined-description: Wisps smoke candle wax seem savory contrast ripe stone fruit lemon aroma concentrated Riesling Ripe juicy tangerine flavor lend sweetness palate cut vein lime acidity reverberates start finish It delicately textured yet chock full vibe zest

description: While remarkably lithe and delicate in style, this complex auslese is lusciously concentrated, with ripe peach and nectarine flavors balanced by hints of smoke, spice and musk. It's zippy and bright, with tart tangerine acidity and a wave of minerality on the finish.
Refined-description: While remarkably lithe delicate style complex auslese lusciously concentrated ripe peach nectarine flavor balanced hint smoke spice musk It zippy bright tart tangerine acidity wave minerality finish

description: Very sweet, honeyed flavors mark this dessert wine. It has apricot, pear, lemon and vanilla richness, brightened by crisp acidity. It's absolutely delicious for drinking now.
Refined-description: Very sweet honeyed flavor mark dessert wine It apricot pear lemon vanilla richness brightened crisp acidity It absolutely delicious drinking

description: The low-yielding vineyards generate concentrated aromas and flavors of cantaloupe, yellow peach, elderberry, crushed tomato vine and exotic fruit. A juicy palate is supported by fresh acidity and the lingering finish ends on a mineral note. It's crisp and delicious now but still can develop more depth. Drink through 2016.
Refined-description: The lowyielding vineyard generate concentrated aroma flavor cantaloupe yellow peach elderberry crushed tomato vine exotic fruit A juicy palate supported fresh acidity lingering finish end mineral note It crisp delicious still develop depth Drink 2016

description: From a small estate, this big, ripe and fruity wine has swathes of black fruits to go with the dark, brooding tannins. Very broad and fruity, the wine is always likely to be structured. Drink from 2017.
Refined-description: From small estate big ripe fruity wine swathe black fruit go dark brooding tannin Very broad fruity wine always likely structured Drink 2017

description: This complex, mature wine has plenty of red fruit flavors, but its main character displays concentrated, tannin and spice. Hints of leather and rich acidity add their notes to this dense, dusty wine. It is ready to drink although it will still mature until 2020.
Refined-description: This complex mature wine plenty red fruit flavor main character display concentrated tannin spice Hints leather rich acidity add note dense dusty wine It ready drink although still mature 2020

description: White wines are rare in the Côte de Nuits and this wine is as structured as many reds. It does have strong toast flavors, a juicy citrus character and pear flavors. They go with an apple skin and spice aftertaste, laced with acidity. Drink until 2022.
Refined-description: White wine rare Côte de Nuits wine structured many red It strong toast flavor juicy citrus character pear flavor They go apple skin spice aftertaste laced acidity Drink 2022

description: Rich blackberry and chocolate form around chalky tannins and a juicy palate, with a waft of cigar in the distance. Medium bodied, round and soft, the finish is brushed in cherry and pomegranate.
Refined-description: Rich blackberry chocolate form around chalky tannin juicy palate waft cigar distance Medium bodied round soft finish brushed cherry pomegranate

description: Tim Knappstein's decision to focus on the Adelaide Hills bears fruit in this terrific-value Pinot Noir. The aromas and flavors are a colorful mélange of beets, black cherries and purple heirloom tomatoes, backed by a rich texture and a long velvety finish. Drink now until 2020.
Refined-description: Tim Knappstein decision focus Adelaide Hills bear fruit terrificvalue Pinot Noir The aroma flavor colorful mélange beet black cherry purple heirloom tomato backed rich texture long velvety finish Drink 2020

description: Stewed prune marinated in spirits, coconut, espresso and grilled herb aromas unfold in the glass. The firm palate offers dark cherry, coffee, anise and tobacco alongside bracing tannins bright acidity. Best after 2019.
Refined-description: Stewed prune marinated spirit coconut espresso grilled herb aroma unfold glass The firm palate offer dark cherry coffee anise tobacco alongside bracing tannin bright acidity Best 2019

description: A strongly wood aged wine, powered by tannins and dense fruits, it is concentrated and still young enough for the wood to show through although the fruit is developing well. This is a structured wine that will need plenty of time to age so drink from 2018.
Refined-description: A strongly wood aged wine powered tannin dense fruit concentrated still young enough wood show although fruit developing well This structured wine need plenty time age drink 2018

description: This nose is rather closed but the firm palate offers ripe sour cherry, dark cooking spice, pipe tobacco and chopped herb. Fresh acidity and youthfully austere but refined tannins provide the backbone. Drink after 2019.
Refined-description: This nose rather closed firm palate offer ripe sour cherry dark cooking spice pipe tobacco chopped herb Fresh acidity youthfully austere refined tannin provide backbone Drink 2019

description: Stainless-steel fermented, this wine remains pungently aromatic in woody, earthy tones, with accents of fragrant orange blossom and pear, while staying crisp and light on the palate. Honey and lemon combine on the complex finish.
Refined-description: Stainlesssteel fermented wine remains pungently aromatic woody earthy tone accent fragrant orange blossom pear staying crisp light palate Honey lemon combine complex finish

description: Classic Nebbiolo aromas of red berry, underbrush, tilled soil, aromatic herb and spice lead the nose. The bracing palate offers dried black cherry, anisette, mocha, toast and grilled herb alongside extremely assertive tannins and brisk acidity. Drink 2019–2031.
Refined-description: Classic Nebbiolo aroma red berry underbrush tilled soil aromatic herb spice lead nose The bracing palate offer dried black cherry anisette mocha toast grilled herb alongside extremely assertive tannin brisk acidity Drink 2019–2031

description: Aromas of red berry, sage, cinnamon and a whisper of menthol lead the nose and carry over to the solid palate together with juicy sour cherry, black raspberry, licorice and tobacco. It's a classic Barolo, straightforward and delicious, with ripe, integrated tannins and fresh acidity.
Refined-description: Aromas red berry sage cinnamon whisper menthol lead nose carry solid palate together juicy sour cherry black raspberry licorice tobacco It classic Barolo straightforward delicious ripe integrated tannin fresh acidity

description: This opens with aromas of woodland berry, crushed herb and a whiff of well-integrated oak. The firm palate delivers dried Morello cherry, baking spice and mocha alongside firm, fine-grained tannin. It closes on a note of star anise. Drink 2016–2021 to capture the fruit richness.
Refined-description: This open aroma woodland berry crushed herb whiff wellintegrated oak The firm palate delivers dried Morello cherry baking spice mocha alongside firm finegrained tannin It close note star anise Drink 2016–2021 capture fruit richness

description: Firm and full-bodied, this opens with aromas of mature plum, underbrush, baked earth, vanilla and exotic spice. The high-toned, chewy palate doles out ripe black cherry, raspberry jam, vanilla, mocha, white pepper and mint alongside polished tannins.
Refined-description: Firm fullbodied open aroma mature plum underbrush baked earth vanilla exotic spice The hightoned chewy palate dole ripe black cherry raspberry jam vanilla mocha white pepper mint alongside polished tannin

description: Classic Albariño aromas of sea brine, tropical fruits, lees and dust precede a minerally lemony palate with tangy flavors of lemon, lime and gooseberry. This is a fresh clean example with a long stony citrusy finish.
Refined-description: Classic Albariño aroma sea brine tropical fruit lee dust precede minerally lemony palate tangy flavor lemon lime gooseberry This fresh clean example long stony citrusy finish

description: Nicely layered aromas of clove, graphite, iron and simmering black cherries show on the complex nose of this well-priced bottling. More iron and raspberry appear on the palate, where a balanced acidity pairs well with the strong mineral character.
Refined-description: Nicely layered aroma clove graphite iron simmering black cherry show complex nose wellpriced bottling More iron raspberry appear palate balanced acidity pair well strong mineral character

description: This wine is all about juicy blackberry and delicious ripe black plums. It is structured, with dry tannins in the background, but up front is fruity, bold and with a lightly smoky, perfumed aftertaste. It is almost ready to drink; just wait until late 2016.
Refined-description: This wine juicy blackberry delicious ripe black plum It structured dry tannin background front fruity bold lightly smoky perfumed aftertaste It almost ready drink wait late 2016

description: Vineyards in the upper Douro Superior region are able to produce surprisingly fresh and fruity whites like this, despite the heat and dry climate. Old vines go into this yellow and green fruit flavored wine with its lively acidity and totally refreshing palate. Drink from summer 2016.
Refined-description: Vineyards upper Douro Superior region able produce surprisingly fresh fruity white like despite heat dry climate Old vine go yellow green fruit flavored wine lively acidity totally refreshing palate Drink summer 2016

description: Though 28 g/L of residual sugar is indicated, this lushly fruity and thoroughly delicious wine does not seem at all sweet, and just barely off dry. Peaches and pears combine in a lightly spicy but intensely flavorful wine with a myriad of food pairing possibilities, notably Thai noodle dishes, or poultry with a fruit sauce.
Refined-description: Though 28 gL residual sugar indicated lushly fruity thoroughly delicious wine seem sweet barely dry Peaches pear combine lightly spicy intensely flavorful wine myriad food pairing possibility notably Thai noodle dish poultry fruit sauce

description: This is a floral blend of 48% Roussanne, 35% Marsanne and 17% Viognier. The Roussanne speaks loudest, while the whole offers a mix of dried and fresh apricot and creamy vanilla wafer that's light bodied and fresh with acidity.
Refined-description: This floral blend 48 Roussanne 35 Marsanne 17 Viognier The Roussanne speaks loudest whole offer mix dried fresh apricot creamy vanilla wafer light bodied fresh acidity

description: This blend of Bordeaux grapes with Syrah is rich and spicy. It is made to be drunk young, with touches of toast and a dense texture that brings out the perfumed character of Syrah balanced with Bordeaux structure. The wine is ready to drink, although it will be better from late 2016.

description: Delicate whiffs of tangerine and lime intensify on the palate of this Spätlese Riesling, complemented by swathes of green herb and pine frond. It's superlight in texture, yet penetrating, showering the palate in sweet-tart grapefruit and Meyer lemon flavors. The finish is crisp and clean.

description: Big red fruit embraces chewy, integrated tannins in this vineyard-designate, a full-bodied explosion of ripeness and bold expression. While powerful, it holds on to nuance via streaks of high-toned citrus, allowing the wine room to breathe and remain lighthearted.

description: Aromas of baked plum are joined by earthy whiffs of truffle, leather, game and cured meat. The aromas carry over to the ripe, dense palate along with fleshy black cherry, anise, mocha and mint. Velvety tannins provide the framework while a confectionary note backs up the finish. Drink 2017–2022.

description: Waves of French oak, coconut, espresso and menthol lead the nose. The dense, extracted palate offers raspberry jam, vanilla, toasted oak and kirsch alongside packed, fine-grained tannins. The warmth of alcohol and a leathery note signal the finish. Nebbiolo purists may find the new wood sensations excessive but if you're into concentrated, oak-driven wines, you'll especially enjoy this.

description: Cherry and plum aromas are earthy, gritty and not overly potent. The palate is saturated, with the right amount of body weight and volume. There's a blitz of berry and black cherry flavors, backed by a finish that's black in nature and shows mild bitter notes of chocolate and coffee.

description: A complex aromatic profile of the fruit, spice and savory elements found in plum chutney, this promising wine drops off a bit once sipped. But it is still tasty, with freshly picked plum flavors bringing fruit, tartness and tannins together, a bit of bacon fat on the finish.

description: Rich, ripe streaks of black cherry preserve are balanced by savory nuances of dried herb, toast and bramble in this luscious Pinot Noir. description: This wine is sourced from a handful of stellar vineyards, including Pratt, Dutton, Sullivan and Chenoweth. It was given 18 months in French oak, all of it twice-used or older, which contributes to an integrated, understated wood presence that's refreshing in its restraint. Creamy acidity and a taste of baked bread cradles lemon zest and almond before a crisp, lengthy finish.
