description: From older vines on the producer's estate, this wine has a depth of richness to the nose and is intensely powerful in gingerbread and Meyer lemon on the medium-bodied palate. Lemony acidity rounds out the finish, flecked in butter.
Refined-description: From older vine producer estate wine depth richness nose intensely powerful gingerbread Meyer lemon mediumbodied palate Lemony acidity round finish flecked butter

description: There is much buzz about this new Steve and Chrystal Clifton (of Palmina and Brewer-Clifton) project that finds inspiration for wine from music. This orange-mauve-pink rosé is redolent with the familiar Pinot components of cherry, sagebrush and clove. On the palate, iron, graphite and wild herbs spice up the pomegranate fruit. It's very varietally pure.
Refined-description: There much buzz new Steve Chrystal Clifton Palmina BrewerClifton project find inspiration wine music This orangemauvepink rosé redolent familiar Pinot component cherry sagebrush clove On palate iron graphite wild herb spice pomegranate fruit It varietally pure

description: This is a brawny, strongly powerful wine, fully displaying the grip of mountain fruit. Blackberry and black currant complement the tobacco and cedar. Drink now through 2023.
Refined-description: This brawny strongly powerful wine fully displaying grip mountain fruit Blackberry black currant complement tobacco cedar Drink 2023

description: This 100% varietal wine offers plenty of crisp cranberry, currant and restrained red fruit on the palate, the texture soft and supple. A pleasing shock of dark chocolate appears on the finish.
Refined-description: This 100 varietal wine offer plenty crisp cranberry currant restrained red fruit palate texture soft supple A pleasing shock dark chocolate appears finish

description: Leather and peppercorn jump from the glass in this soft, strong wine, powerful in tannin and dusty earth. A gravelly, rocky component plays on the palate around waves of chocolate and black currant, finishing in herb.
Refined-description: Leather peppercorn jump glass soft strong wine powerful tannin dusty earth A gravelly rocky component play palate around wave chocolate black currant finishing herb

description: A blend of 60% Montepulciano and 40% Sangiovese, this is a grippy, leathery wine, the fruit sourced from two different sites in the appellation. Black leather, baked and dried plum, and cherry combine on the palate with breadth and length, finishing as if dusted in cocoa.
Refined-description: A blend 60 Montepulciano 40 Sangiovese grippy leathery wine fruit sourced two different site appellation Black leather baked dried plum cherry combine palate breadth length finishing dusted cocoa

description: Red berry, chopped herb, blue flower and menthol all come together on this elegantly structured red. The juicy, accessible palate offers ripe black cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and a hint of vanilla alongside round tannins. Drink through 2021.
Refined-description: Red berry chopped herb blue flower menthol come together elegantly structured red The juicy accessible palate offer ripe black cherry crushed raspberry licorice hint vanilla alongside round tannin Drink 2021

description: Smoky, oaky, rubbery aromas are sophisticated and inviting. This blend of 90% Garnacha and 10% Carignan feels smooth, but with a healthy pulse. Plum and cherry flavors carry a note of oaky char, while a long, toasty finish offers a complex note of cured meat. Drink through 2020.
Refined-description: Smoky oaky rubbery aroma sophisticated inviting This blend 90 Garnacha 10 Carignan feel smooth healthy pulse Plum cherry flavor carry note oaky char long toasty finish offer complex note cured meat Drink 2020

description: From the heart of the Rutherford Bench, this estate-grown wine is a classic version of restraint and elegance, structured in dusty tannin with bursts of cedar, tomato leaf and cassis. Cabernet Franc makes up 8% of the blend, with 3% Merlot. This will benefit from time in the cellar; drink 2020–2023.
Refined-description: From heart Rutherford Bench estategrown wine classic version restraint elegance structured dusty tannin burst cedar tomato leaf cassis Cabernet Franc make 8 blend 3 Merlot This benefit time cellar drink 2020–2023

description: Complex and well balanced, this wine shows enticing aromas of fruits, spices and subtle herbs followed by tangy, dry, and slightly lean flavors like cranberry and rhubarb. It will be great with a roast fowl of some kind and should mellow more with time. Best after 2018.
Refined-description: Complex well balanced wine show enticing aroma fruit spice subtle herb followed tangy dry slightly lean flavor like cranberry rhubarb It great roast fowl kind mellow time Best 2018

description: Decadent and candied, this is an oaky, well-made wine with richness at its core. Tahitian vanilla, caramel and Meyer lemon give way to more weighty tropical characteristics, making for a ripe, bigger-styled wine.
Refined-description: Decadent candied oaky wellmade wine richness core Tahitian vanilla caramel Meyer lemon give way weighty tropical characteristic making ripe biggerstyled wine

description: This mid-sized négociant has turned out a solid Tavel. It's classic red-berry hue is typical for the appellation, followed by ample weight on the palate and bold cherry-berry flavors—all wrapped up by a long, mouthwatering finish.
Refined-description: This midsized négociant turned solid Tavel It classic redberry hue typical appellation followed ample weight palate bold cherryberry flavors—all wrapped long mouthwatering finish

description: This ambitious blend of 60% Sangiovese, 15% Merlot, 15% Petite Sirah and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon largely succeeds, with aromas of tight blueberries, concentrated purple flowers and a touch of crushed peppercorn. The fruit-driven palate is dense with blueberry, tart boysenberry and a dusting of cocoa.
Refined-description: This ambitious blend 60 Sangiovese 15 Merlot 15 Petite Sirah 10 Cabernet Sauvignon largely succeeds aroma tight blueberry concentrated purple flower touch crushed peppercorn The fruitdriven palate dense blueberry tart boysenberry dusting cocoa

description: This wine is a big one, going all out to make friends. New-oak aromas like clove, cedar and cinnamon explode out of the glass, then flavors of dark chocolate and cherry spread across the palate for a generous—almost thick—impression. Fine layers of tannins and firm acidity blanket the texture.
Refined-description: This wine big one going make friend Newoak aroma like clove cedar cinnamon explode glass flavor dark chocolate cherry spread across palate generous—almost thick—impression Fine layer tannin firm acidity blanket texture

description: This late harvest wine reminds one of lemon grass, cut grass and honeysuckle. It is sweet with a good acid balance along with flavors of lemon meringue pie and lemon curd.
Refined-description: This late harvest wine reminds one lemon grass cut grass honeysuckle It sweet good acid balance along flavor lemon meringue pie lemon curd

description: Clean, crisp and bright, this was fermented in stainless (with just 10% in neutral wood), and not put through malolactic. The blend is 60/40 Chardonnay/Pinot Noir, yielding fresh fruit flavors of apple and melon that are focused and precise. A streak of ginger runs through racy acidity.
Refined-description: Clean crisp bright fermented stainless 10 neutral wood put malolactic The blend 6040 ChardonnayPinot Noir yielding fresh fruit flavor apple melon focused precise A streak ginger run racy acidity

description: Firm and focused, this lightly spiced effort supports its tart cherry fruit with ample acidity. Hints of toasted coconut build in the finish. A few more years of bottle age should bring further integration.
Refined-description: Firm focused lightly spiced effort support tart cherry fruit ample acidity Hints toasted coconut build finish A year bottle age bring integration

description: A striking shade of amber/orange, this soft and fruity wine is open and loose knit, with broad flavors of mature, slightly oxidized tree fruits, plus lightly spicy notes of cinnamon and baking spices. It's very well made, but well apart from any standard approach.
Refined-description: A striking shade amberorange soft fruity wine open loose knit broad flavor mature slightly oxidized tree fruit plus lightly spicy note cinnamon baking spice It well made well apart standard approach

description: A delicate streak of honeycomb gilds layers of yellow peaches, apples and tangerines in this off-dry Riesling. Its concentrated fruitiness is lip smacking, but it's also quite elegant, reverberating long on a steely strike of acidity and minerality. Drink now through 2020.
Refined-description: A delicate streak honeycomb gild layer yellow peach apple tangerine offdry Riesling Its concentrated fruitiness lip smacking also quite elegant reverberating long steely strike acidity minerality Drink 2020

description: Mature black fruit, toast and spice aromas lead the nose. The firm palate is still tightly wound, offering baked black cherry, licorice and espresso balanced by youthfully assertive, taut tannins. Drink after 2019.
Refined-description: Mature black fruit toast spice aroma lead nose The firm palate still tightly wound offering baked black cherry licorice espresso balanced youthfully assertive taut tannin Drink 2019

description: Crushed rose, pressed violet, perfumed berry, sage and a balsamic note are just some of the aromas you'll find on this full-bodied red. The firm palate offers dried black cherry, black pepper and licorice alongside tightly knit tannins and the subtle warmth of alcohol. Give it a few more years to come together. Drink 2018–2016.
Refined-description: Crushed rose pressed violet perfumed berry sage balsamic note aroma find fullbodied red The firm palate offer dried black cherry black pepper licorice alongside tightly knit tannin subtle warmth alcohol Give year come together Drink 2018–2016

description: A nose of wild blackberry and brambles lays the groundwork for a tender dance of fruit and herbal flavors, especially blackberry, pomegranate, eucalyptus and fennel bulb. Mouth-coating tannins dissipate on the finish, joined by a burst of tart pomegranate.
Refined-description: A nose wild blackberry bramble lay groundwork tender dance fruit herbal flavor especially blackberry pomegranate eucalyptus fennel bulb Mouthcoating tannin dissipate finish joined burst tart pomegranate

description: This is an unusual, exotic take on Malbec. The bouquet delivers cardamom, sandalwood and spiced black currant aromas. In the mouth, it's grabby with pinching tannins. Blueberry and cardamom flavors end ripe, with decent follow through. Drink now.
Refined-description: This unusual exotic take Malbec The bouquet delivers cardamom sandalwood spiced black currant aroma In mouth grabby pinching tannin Blueberry cardamom flavor end ripe decent follow Drink

description: This falls sbetween a rosé and an orange wine in its appearance, a pale salmon/copper shade that results from 36 hours of skin contact before pressing. Scents of hibiscus tea and rosewater put a delicate top note ahead of rich, ripe, round and spicy citrus fruit. A strong impression of cinnamon marks the finish.
Refined-description: This fall sbetween rosé orange wine appearance pale salmoncopper shade result 36 hour skin contact pressing Scents hibiscus tea rosewater put delicate top note ahead rich ripe round spicy citrus fruit A strong impression cinnamon mark finish

description: Red rose, wild berry, toast, tobacco and a whiff of underbrush meld in the glass. On the firm palate, notes of clove, ground pepper, cinnamon, anise and mocha accent the red berry core. Firm, fine-grained tannins offer structure.
Refined-description: Red rose wild berry toast tobacco whiff underbrush meld glass On firm palate note clove ground pepper cinnamon anise mocha accent red berry core Firm finegrained tannin offer structure

description: Ripe borderline raisiny aromas include earth, cedar and graphite scents. This is concentrated, grabby and fully extracted. Flavors of jammy black fruits blend with spicy saucy notes prior to a finish with flavors of tomato, herbs, salt and gamy meat. Firm acidity guarantees this will last at least another five years before falling off.
Refined-description: Ripe borderline raisiny aroma include earth cedar graphite scent This concentrated grabby fully extracted Flavors jammy black fruit blend spicy saucy note prior finish flavor tomato herb salt gamy meat Firm acidity guarantee last least another five year falling

description: Aromas of perfumed berry, mint baking spice, toast and espresso waft out of the glass. The palate is tight and rather primary at the moment, showing raw black cherry, raspberry, clove and toasted notes. It's still young but balanced, with fresh acidity and firm, fine–grained tannins. Drink 2016–2022.
Refined-description: Aromas perfumed berry mint baking spice toast espresso waft glass The palate tight rather primary moment showing raw black cherry raspberry clove toasted note It still young balanced fresh acidity firm fine–grained tannin Drink 2016–2022

description: A field blend of 85% Zinfandel, 11% Alicante Bouschet and 4% Petite Sirah, this juicy, spicy wine is robust and full bodied. Blackberry syrup and black cherry combine around cinnamon and black pepper, finishing in a wave of power.
Refined-description: A field blend 85 Zinfandel 11 Alicante Bouschet 4 Petite Sirah juicy spicy wine robust full bodied Blackberry syrup black cherry combine around cinnamon black pepper finishing wave power

description: Fresh and refined, this delightful, easy-drinking wine opens with scents of rose, woodland berry and a whiff of dark cooking spice. The vibrant, savory palate offers juicy red cherry, raspberry and white pepper alongside bright acidity and polished tannins. Drink through 2018.
Refined-description: Fresh refined delightful easydrinking wine open scent rose woodland berry whiff dark cooking spice The vibrant savory palate offer juicy red cherry raspberry white pepper alongside bright acidity polished tannin Drink 2018

description: Monbazillac, with its impressive castle, is part of the Bergerac region that makes some beautiful dessert wines. This wine, with its refreshing balance between acidity and rich honeyed flavors, conveys Seville orange marmalade and lemon acidity, with a smooth, botrytis aftertaste. Drink now, or better age until 2017.
Refined-description: Monbazillac impressive castle part Bergerac region make beautiful dessert wine This wine refreshing balance acidity rich honeyed flavor conveys Seville orange marmalade lemon acidity smooth botrytis aftertaste Drink better age 2017

description: Named after the winemaker, Amélie Couillard, this soft, rounded wine is smooth with creamed apple flavors while also having a proper tangy of acidity. That tight and tangy edge makes the wine refreshing now while also allowing it to age for a few more months. Drink now or from late 2016.
Refined-description: Named winemaker Amélie Couillard soft rounded wine smooth creamed apple flavor also proper tangy acidity That tight tangy edge make wine refreshing also allowing age month Drink late 2016

description: This wine is very structured and firm. With some barrel aging, the tannins have been smoothed out although the wine remains with a dry core and fresh acidity. Black-currant flavors dominate, giving a wine that is bright and fruity at the end.
Refined-description: This wine structured firm With barrel aging tannin smoothed although wine remains dry core fresh acidity Blackcurrant flavor dominate giving wine bright fruity end

description: An impressive blend of Merlot and Malbec, this is a solid, dark wine packed with both tannins and ripe berry fruits. It has a serious character with toast, acidity and complex spice flavors. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: An impressive blend Merlot Malbec solid dark wine packed tannin ripe berry fruit It serious character toast acidity complex spice flavor Drink 2018

description: This ripe wine with open fruits has 40% Cabernet Franc in the blend, which lends an attractive perfumed character and gives the wine rich character and fruitiness. It will age for a few more years and be ready to drink from 2017.
Refined-description: This ripe wine open fruit 40 Cabernet Franc blend lends attractive perfumed character give wine rich character fruitiness It age year ready drink 2017

description: Roast beef, grape candy, cracked blueberry, beef char and grapy freshness come to the nose on this bottling. The candied grape and blueberry elements carry dark-fruit character to the palate, along with licorice that gives depth. Roasting herbs in the midpalate adds savory flair.
Refined-description: Roast beef grape candy cracked blueberry beef char grapy freshness come nose bottling The candied grape blueberry element carry darkfruit character palate along licorice give depth Roasting herb midpalate add savory flair

description: At David Hill, the Winemakers Cuvée is a cut above the reserve. It's a muscular blend of scents and flavors of lavender, cherry and chocolate wrapped into a firm, focused finish.
Refined-description: At David Hill Winemakers Cuvée cut reserve It muscular blend scent flavor lavender cherry chocolate wrapped firm focused finish

description: Wild berry, grilled herb, aniseed and a hint of vanilla are some of the aromas you'll find on this attractive red. The linear, elegantly structured palate offers ripe black cherry, raspberry, licorice and grilled sage while a tobacco note closes the firm finish.
Refined-description: Wild berry grilled herb aniseed hint vanilla aroma find attractive red The linear elegantly structured palate offer ripe black cherry raspberry licorice grilled sage tobacco note close firm finish

description: Waxy apple stars in this brisk, approachable white from a single estate-farmed block, the oak briny and salty in toast and honey. Textured and elegantly light bodied, it finishes with a satisfying note of lemon candy.
Refined-description: Waxy apple star brisk approachable white single estatefarmed block oak briny salty toast honey Textured elegantly light bodied finish satisfying note lemon candy

description: Pristine white peaches seem suspended in a crystalline solution of river rocks and mineral water in this refreshing dry Pinot Blanc. It's delicate in stature but abounds in elegance. Drink now through 2020.
Refined-description: Pristine white peach seem suspended crystalline solution river rock mineral water refreshing dry Pinot Blanc It delicate stature abounds elegance Drink 2020

description: Raspberry, rose petal, baking spice, tilled soil and new leather aromas unfold on this structured red. The chewy, full-bodied palate doles out juicy wild cherry, menthol and dark cooking spice while assertive tannins and fresh acidity lend balance. Drink 2019–2029.
Refined-description: Raspberry rose petal baking spice tilled soil new leather aroma unfold structured red The chewy fullbodied palate dole juicy wild cherry menthol dark cooking spice assertive tannin fresh acidity lend balance Drink 2019–2029

description: A blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon with 15% Merlot, this was built to be approachable young. Grapes are sourced from an estate, organically farmed vineyard as well as two neighboring properties, Pickberry and Murray Ranch. Tobacco forms around a juiciness of blackberry and raspberry, giving it a sultry edge, while maintaing soft tannins throughout.
Refined-description: A blend 85 Cabernet Sauvignon 15 Merlot built approachable young Grapes sourced estate organically farmed vineyard well two neighboring property Pickberry Murray Ranch Tobacco form around juiciness blackberry raspberry giving sultry edge maintaing soft tannin throughout

description: Smooth, deep aromas of licorice and blackberry are composed. This Mencía feels full and lusty, with grip but nothing too hard or edgy. Earthy black fruit flavors are savory, toasty and meaty, while the finish is woody and plump. Drink through 2020.
Refined-description: Smooth deep aroma licorice blackberry composed This Mencía feel full lusty grip nothing hard edgy Earthy black fruit flavor savory toasty meaty finish woody plump Drink 2020

description: Despite its richness, this is a stylish wine that exudes freshness as much as dense fruit and structure. A blend of Touriga Nacional, Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon, all structured varieties, it still yields a generous full-bodied and rounded wine. It does need to age, so drink from 2018.
Refined-description: Despite richness stylish wine exudes freshness much dense fruit structure A blend Touriga Nacional Syrah Cabernet Sauvignon structured variety still yield generous fullbodied rounded wine It need age drink 2018

description: Sourced from the southeastern section of the Rutherford appellation and 100% varietal, this is a seamlessly made wine, luxurious in cherry pie and leather saddle. Tangy acidity meets the dusty tannins head-on, finishing with a burst of orange zest.
Refined-description: Sourced southeastern section Rutherford appellation 100 varietal seamlessly made wine luxurious cherry pie leather saddle Tangy acidity meet dusty tannin headon finishing burst orange zest

description: While barrel-influenced and full-bodied, this unctuous wine remains crisp in edgy acidity, with lean flavors of lemon and grapefruit amidst a deeper, richer background of oak and caramel.
Refined-description: While barrelinfluenced fullbodied unctuous wine remains crisp edgy acidity lean flavor lemon grapefruit amidst deeper richer background oak caramel

description: Freshly cut quince, guava, lemongrass and key lime aromas combine with a stony quality on the nose of this vibrant, zesty wine. Its acidity is almost effervescent, infusing the palate with boundless energy, while its chalky grip carries sharp green apple notes alongside warmer touches of pineapple and guava. Those vivid flavors linger for a full minute.
Refined-description: Freshly cut quince guava lemongrass key lime aroma combine stony quality nose vibrant zesty wine Its acidity almost effervescent infusing palate boundless energy chalky grip carry sharp green apple note alongside warmer touch pineapple guava Those vivid flavor linger full minute

description: Bright raspberry, cherry and rose petal aromas meet cola spice on the pretty, delicate nose of this bottling—a solid example of the surge in quality of Central Coast Grenache. There is a tense tannic structure to the palate despite its light nature, with great acidity presenting tangy red and purple fruit flavors, with more rose petal accents.
Refined-description: Bright raspberry cherry rose petal aroma meet cola spice pretty delicate nose bottling—a solid example surge quality Central Coast Grenache There tense tannic structure palate despite light nature great acidity presenting tangy red purple fruit flavor rose petal accent

description: This stellar reserve remains one of the finest Chardonnays from Oregon. Meyer lemon, peanut oil, salted nuts, citrus and tangerine combine in a deep and intense palate. Whole-cluster pressed and barrel fermented (but in just 10% new French oak), this delicious, dense and penetrating wine should be consumed now through the early 2020s.
Refined-description: This stellar reserve remains one finest Chardonnays Oregon Meyer lemon peanut oil salted nut citrus tangerine combine deep intense palate Wholecluster pressed barrel fermented 10 new French oak delicious dense penetrating wine consumed early 2020s

description: The most recent of Palliser's Great Dog releases, the 2014 Ted is a full-bodied, muscular wine. Cola, cinnamon and thyme notes mark the nose, while the flavors feature dark cherries and plums, drawing to a lingering close with echoes of mocha and Mexican chocolate. Drink 2020–2028.
Refined-description: The recent Palliser Great Dog release 2014 Ted fullbodied muscular wine Cola cinnamon thyme note mark nose flavor feature dark cherry plum drawing lingering close echo mocha Mexican chocolate Drink 2020–2028

description: This is a golden, mature and sweet wine that comes from the white wine appellation of the Madiran region. It balances ripe apricot and honey with intense acidity to create a beautiful wine. The zesty marmalade and final crispness are delicious. Drink now.
Refined-description: This golden mature sweet wine come white wine appellation Madiran region It balance ripe apricot honey intense acidity create beautiful wine The zesty marmalade final crispness delicious Drink

description: An attractive silver-pink colored wine, this is beautifully ripe and fruity. It has a great balance between acidity and raspberry fruit. There is a herbal edge that gives the wine a fine tangy character. Drink this wine from the end of 2017.
Refined-description: An attractive silverpink colored wine beautifully ripe fruity It great balance acidity raspberry fruit There herbal edge give wine fine tangy character Drink wine end 2017

description: This wood-aged wine is a fascinating example of how rosé can age. It is certainly mature and has lost its crisp fruitiness. But it has gained toast, a smooth rich texture and plenty of spice. It's obviously a food wine, ready to drink now.
Refined-description: This woodaged wine fascinating example rosé age It certainly mature lost crisp fruitiness But gained toast smooth rich texture plenty spice It obviously food wine ready drink

description: Dense tannins and powerful black fruits reinforce the almost-black color of the wine. It is a strong wine, powered by dark plums, rich tannins and very fine acidity. Produced from organic grapes, it is an impressive wine for long-term aging. Drink from 2020.
Refined-description: Dense tannin powerful black fruit reinforce almostblack color wine It strong wine powered dark plum rich tannin fine acidity Produced organic grape impressive wine longterm aging Drink 2020

description: Wreaths of smoke surround pretty raspberry aromatics. The red and plummy purple-fruit flavors continue, along with some tannic muscle and grip. This is a mix of 667 and Pommard clones—still young and a bit tight.
Refined-description: Wreaths smoke surround pretty raspberry aromatics The red plummy purplefruit flavor continue along tannic muscle grip This mix 667 Pommard clones—still young bit tight

description: This was the first winery to make a truly white Pinot Noir (back in 2004). Produced exclusively from Pommard clones, it's barrel fermented and aged much like a Chardonnay. Along with great texture and length, there's plenty of acid supporting its palate-pleasing mix of white peach, melon and gooseberry. It finishes with a thread of lightly buttery caramel.
Refined-description: This first winery make truly white Pinot Noir back 2004 Produced exclusively Pommard clone barrel fermented aged much like Chardonnay Along great texture length plenty acid supporting palatepleasing mix white peach melon gooseberry It finish thread lightly buttery caramel

description: Like many of the winery's bottlings, this wine shows rich but balanced concentration. Loamy and fulfilling baked blueberry and blackberry aromas are laced with vanilla. The palate is lavish as well, with strong blueberry syrup, herb and pepper flavors and a caramel touch on the finish.
Refined-description: Like many winery bottlings wine show rich balanced concentration Loamy fulfilling baked blueberry blackberry aroma laced vanilla The palate lavish well strong blueberry syrup herb pepper flavor caramel touch finish

description: Ivy leaf and ripe, green pear notes make up this wine's enticing nose. The palate brims with juicy pear and citrus, feeling concentrated, lively and moreish. Dry and streamlined with citrus, it also layers pear and peach fruit before finishing with lip-smacking citrus zest.
Refined-description: Ivy leaf ripe green pear note make wine enticing nose The palate brim juicy pear citrus feeling concentrated lively moreish Dry streamlined citrus also layer pear peach fruit finishing lipsmacking citrus zest

description: Dark cherry and cola aromas meld with composting rose scents on the nose of this pleasing wine that will satisfy any lover of Pinot Noir. The palate exudes nutmeg, iron and rose flavors galore, adding spice to its core of plump raspberry and ripe cranberry fruit. Lively acidity and tannic depth complete the experience.
Refined-description: Dark cherry cola aroma meld composting rose scent nose pleasing wine satisfy lover Pinot Noir The palate exudes nutmeg iron rose flavor galore adding spice core plump raspberry ripe cranberry fruit Lively acidity tannic depth complete experience

description: A hearty swirl in the glass wakes up this wine's aroma, showing lemon balm, cress and green pear. Those fresh flavors also play on the lithe palate, where yeasty savoriness is enhanced by lemony spritz. It's totally zippy and refreshing, with far more concentration than is at first apparent, proving it needs time to breathe.
Refined-description: A hearty swirl glass wake wine aroma showing lemon balm cress green pear Those fresh flavor also play lithe palate yeasty savoriness enhanced lemony spritz It totally zippy refreshing far concentration first apparent proving need time breathe

description: This is the reserve-level Pinot Gris, comprised of lots from five different vineyards. Juicy, succulent and quite tart fruit flavors emphasize fresh apples and pears, lightly dusted with cinnamon spice. The concentration and lingering finish prove it worthy of its reserve status.
Refined-description: This reservelevel Pinot Gris comprised lot five different vineyard Juicy succulent quite tart fruit flavor emphasize fresh apple pear lightly dusted cinnamon spice The concentration lingering finish prove worthy reserve status

description: This new offering, made by Ross Cobb and Katy Wilson, is intended as a “best of the west.” Sourced from several vineyards, it reveals true coastal qualities, with ethereal earthiness and an Old World sensibility. Cloudy in the glass, it shows cranberry, orange, bay leaf and tea flavors as it unwinds.
Refined-description: This new offering made Ross Cobb Katy Wilson intended “ best west ” Sourced several vineyard reveals true coastal quality ethereal earthiness Old World sensibility Cloudy glass show cranberry orange bay leaf tea flavor unwinds

description: Bryan Babcock makes plenty of more expensive Pinot Noirs, but this appellation blend hits all the right notes and shows off the results of the “pedestular cane suspension” technique he's been using in the vineyard. Wild thyme, sagebrush and bay leaf meet cranberry and slate aromas on the nose. Black raspberry and cranberry flavors lead the earthy palate, accented with nettle and peppercorn.
Refined-description: Bryan Babcock make plenty expensive Pinot Noirs appellation blend hit right note show result “ pedestular cane suspension ” technique using vineyard Wild thyme sagebrush bay leaf meet cranberry slate aroma nose Black raspberry cranberry flavor lead earthy palate accented nettle peppercorn

description: This 25% whole cluster bottling from the Full Draw Vineyard shows black cherry, leather, cola and sarsaparilla scents on the nose. Cherry cola and vanilla flavors mark the palate, where medium acidity and persistent tannins ensure solid cellaring potential. Drink 2018–2025.
Refined-description: This 25 whole cluster bottling Full Draw Vineyard show black cherry leather cola sarsaparilla scent nose Cherry cola vanilla flavor mark palate medium acidity persistent tannin ensure solid cellaring potential Drink 2018–2025

description: In French, the vineyard name means “the meadow on the mountain,” a fitting name for the site. This is a spicy wine, with a touch of red-hot candy. The pretty cherry fruit is underscored with earth and mineral, and the astringent, tea-flavored tannins morph into a suggestion of cola at the tail end.
Refined-description: In French vineyard name mean “ meadow mountain ” fitting name site This spicy wine touch redhot candy The pretty cherry fruit underscored earth mineral astringent teaflavored tannin morph suggestion cola tail end

description: Almost white in color, this is a rich wine with intense red-currant and raspberry fruits. It is a dry wine, destined to partner food, with fine acidity as well as a herbal edge. It is a concentrated wine, ready to drink from the end of 2017.
Refined-description: Almost white color rich wine intense redcurrant raspberry fruit It dry wine destined partner food fine acidity well herbal edge It concentrated wine ready drink end 2017

description: The top wine from this estate is impressive. It has rich black fruits and firm tannins, showing its youthfulness. Its weight and concentration combine with the ripe fruits to give a wine that is destined for long-term aging. Négrette, Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon go into this fine blend. Drink it from 2020.
Refined-description: The top wine estate impressive It rich black fruit firm tannin showing youthfulness Its weight concentration combine ripe fruit give wine destined longterm aging Négrette Syrah Cabernet Sauvignon go fine blend Drink 2020

description: Crisp, refreshing and uniquely spicy and mineral-driven, this blends 50% Sauvignon blanc, 25% Ribolla Gialla, 20% Sémillon and 5% Tocai Friulano—all unusual varieties in the Napa Valley. Light, bright and fleshy, it tastes of lemon, mango and the sea.
Refined-description: Crisp refreshing uniquely spicy mineraldriven blend 50 Sauvignon blanc 25 Ribolla Gialla 20 Sémillon 5 Tocai Friulano—all unusual variety Napa Valley Light bright fleshy taste lemon mango sea

description: This blends 52% Chardonnay and 48% Pinot Noir in a seamless, focused package of bright acidity, moderate mousse and tangled peach, tangerine and blood orange flavors. It has impressive complexity and length, with a nutty note that closes out the finish.
Refined-description: This blend 52 Chardonnay 48 Pinot Noir seamless focused package bright acidity moderate mousse tangled peach tangerine blood orange flavor It impressive complexity length nutty note close finish

description: This is a hearty version of a grape frequently made in a simpler, fresh style, showing roasted red berry, charcoal and mocha aromas on the nose. A deep cassis flavor permeates the palate, with beef char and black pepper accents that make for a compelling, rather lavish sip.
Refined-description: This hearty version grape frequently made simpler fresh style showing roasted red berry charcoal mocha aroma nose A deep cassis flavor permeates palate beef char black pepper accent make compelling rather lavish sip

description: This attention-grabber hits the palate with reckless abandon. Stewed black plum and sugar plum aromas meet vanilla and strawberry pie scents on the lush nose. It's plush with creamy coffee, milk chocolate, blackberry and black cherry flavors, framed by soft tannins and a fine streak of acidity. Rather delicious.
Refined-description: This attentiongrabber hit palate reckless abandon Stewed black plum sugar plum aroma meet vanilla strawberry pie scent lush nose It plush creamy coffee milk chocolate blackberry black cherry flavor framed soft tannin fine streak acidity Rather delicious

description: Though labeled Willamette Valley, this is single vineyard Chehalem Mountains AVA fruit. Smooth, ripe and buttery, from sniff to swallow, it's loaded with Satsuma orange, Meyer lemon and pink-grapefruit flavors. The acids snap and the finish lingers, with a streak of vanilla and a slight sensation of heat.

description: This is a very limited bottling of 80% Cabernet Franc and 20% Merlot. Roughly half spent time in new French oak, which brings a lovely toasty note into the foreground. There's a slight, not unpleasant funkiness, along with dusty baking spices, black cherry and currant, and a chunk of dark chocolate. It's big, bold and delicious, and drinking quite well at the moment.

description: This bottling from Syrah legend Bob Lindquist, sourced from the biodynamic vineyard that he planted, delivers snappy boysenberry, white pepper, rosemary and lavender aromas. The palate judiciously balances savory, peppery spice and lush purple floral notes with tangy black plum fruit and rosehip accents, making for a wondrous sip.

It's a seamless combo of spice, fruit, wood and herbs, but will evolve through at least 2025.

description: Aromas of ripe red cherries, licorice and vanilla extract emerge from this wine by the longtime estate across from the township of Santa Ynez. Blackberry and blueberry fruits power the palate, but there's a black dirt earthiness and some meatiness too. Tannins are still quite strong.
Refined-description: Aromas ripe red cherry licorice vanilla extract emerge wine longtime estate across township Santa Ynez Blackberry blueberry fruit power palate black dirt earthiness meatiness Tannins still quite strong

description: This blend of 50% Viognier, 19% Chardonnay, 19% Sauvignon Blanc and 12% Pinot Gris offers notes of pear and flowers. It's broad and creamy in feel with stone fruit flavors on the finish.
Refined-description: This blend 50 Viognier 19 Chardonnay 19 Sauvignon Blanc 12 Pinot Gris offer note pear flower It broad creamy feel stone fruit flavor finish

description: Softly layered red and black berries belie this wine's concentration and force, which is substantial, a backing of powerful leathery tannins at its core. On the nose, there's black peppercorn and an herbal element.
Refined-description: Softly layered red black berry belie wine concentration force substantial backing powerful leathery tannin core On nose black peppercorn herbal element

description: This emphasizes freshness and a light touch, rather than the assertive flavors that this varietal can produce. It smells like rose petals, has a soft texture, rose petal and pear flavors, and delivers a light spritzy feeling on the tongue.
Refined-description: This emphasizes freshness light touch rather assertive flavor varietal produce It smell like rose petal soft texture rose petal pear flavor delivers light spritzy feeling tongue

description: A kitchen-sink blend of nine different varieties with Merlot (40%) and Syrah (25%) taking the lead, this wine brings an assortment of herbs, blue fruit and woodspice along with light volatile notes. It's full bodied and sweet with abundant cherry flavors backed by grainy tannins.
Refined-description: A kitchensink blend nine different variety Merlot 40 Syrah 25 taking lead wine brings assortment herb blue fruit woodspice along light volatile note It full bodied sweet abundant cherry flavor backed grainy tannin

description: With 5% Viognier giving it an extra boost, this richly aromatic wine suggests apricot and dried mango. It drinks quite sweet with abundant stone-fruit flavors. Enjoy as an apéritif or digestif.
Refined-description: With 5 Viognier giving extra boost richly aromatic wine suggests apricot dried mango It drink quite sweet abundant stonefruit flavor Enjoy apéritif digestif

description: This biodynamically farmed wine comes from Steep Creek Ranch next to the winery facility and Nelson Vineyard on the shores of the Columbia River. It shows lots of intrigue, with pure notes of herbs, mulberry and mineral that are enjoyable yet elusive. It's clingy in feel, with elegant yet rich fruit flavors.
Refined-description: This biodynamically farmed wine come Steep Creek Ranch next winery facility Nelson Vineyard shore Columbia River It show lot intrigue pure note herb mulberry mineral enjoyable yet elusive It clingy feel elegant yet rich fruit flavor

description: Faint aromas on this 100% varietal wine suggest star fruit and wet stone. It's broad and fleshy in feel, but with light concentration to the Meyer lemon flavors. Pair with beurre-blanc sauced seafood.
Refined-description: Faint aroma 100 varietal wine suggest star fruit wet stone It broad fleshy feel light concentration Meyer lemon flavor Pair beurreblanc sauced seafood

description: Crisp lemon, fennel and Bosc pear come into play in this medium-bodied Chardonnay, accented by a taste of fig. Taking on depth and breadth as it develops in the glass and on the palate, the wine finishes long and lean.
Refined-description: Crisp lemon fennel Bosc pear come play mediumbodied Chardonnay accented taste fig Taking depth breadth develops glass palate wine finish long lean

description: This is a rich, maturing wine that is full of toasty, yeasty flavors that are finely integrated with the orange zest and apple flavors. It is just right to drink now, at a midway point between youth and maturity but it will age for several more years. Drink until 2020.
Refined-description: This rich maturing wine full toasty yeasty flavor finely integrated orange zest apple flavor It right drink midway point youth maturity age several year Drink 2020

description: With mint and black fruit aromas, this is a ripe, fruity wood-aged wine. Power and complexity come from the structure and the dark black fruits. Hints of licorice accent the strong tannins and fruit. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: With mint black fruit aroma ripe fruity woodaged wine Power complexity come structure dark black fruit Hints licorice accent strong tannin fruit Drink 2018

description: Ayala specializes in dry Champagnes and this is their extreme example. It has the right amount of bottle age to soften the intense acidity and bring in some toastiness and fruit. It can be drunk now, but a few more months in bottle would make it even better.
Refined-description: Ayala specializes dry Champagnes extreme example It right amount bottle age soften intense acidity bring toastiness fruit It drunk month bottle would make even better

description: Made from organically farmed grapes, this hearty blend of 90% Sangiovese and 10% Canaiolo opens with earthy aromas of violets, iris, mature black fruit and leather. The juicy, ripe palate delivers fleshy black cherry, truffle, tobacco, black pepper and mint alongside solid tannins. It has a meaty, rustic note but it's delicious. Alberello Imports, Ionia Atlantic Imports.
Refined-description: Made organically farmed grape hearty blend 90 Sangiovese 10 Canaiolo open earthy aroma violet iris mature black fruit leather The juicy ripe palate delivers fleshy black cherry truffle tobacco black pepper mint alongside solid tannin It meaty rustic note delicious Alberello Imports Ionia Atlantic Imports

description: This is a bone-dry, tannic, acidic and tightly wound Cabernet, with a solid core of blackberry aromas and flavors. Stylistically, it plants its flag squarely in favor of elegance, it just needs a little more time to fully integrate.
Refined-description: This bonedry tannic acidic tightly wound Cabernet solid core blackberry aroma flavor Stylistically plant flag squarely favor elegance need little time fully integrate

description: What this 100% Merlot lacks in subtlety, it makes up for in the sheer power of its fruit. It's rich and spicy in black cherry, milk chocolate, red licorice and oak, after being aged for 20 months in 100% new French barrels. With thick but refined tannins, it's drinkable now.
Refined-description: What 100 Merlot lack subtlety make sheer power fruit It rich spicy black cherry milk chocolate red licorice oak aged 20 month 100 new French barrel With thick refined tannin drinkable

description: The vineyard is in the Santa Maria Valley, and has been source for many years of great Pinots for multiple wineries lucky enough to obtain its fruit. The wines always show a similar profile of tannins, brisk acidity, a certain full-bodiedness and plenty of crushed brown spices. In this cool '11 vintage, the wine is particularly tart in cranberries and raspberries. Decant for a few hours before drinking.
Refined-description: The vineyard Santa Maria Valley source many year great Pinots multiple winery lucky enough obtain fruit The wine always show similar profile tannin brisk acidity certain fullbodiedness plenty crushed brown spice In cool 11 vintage wine particularly tart cranberry raspberry Decant hour drinking

description: The winery's top cuvée is notable for its perfume of rose petals with a subtle whiff of body talc. Balanced and feminine, this soft and graceful wine glides across the palate with flavor highlights of cherries and plums. Drink now while it's at its best.
Refined-description: The winery top cuvée notable perfume rose petal subtle whiff body talc Balanced feminine soft graceful wine glide across palate flavor highlight cherry plum Drink best

description: Technically a Zin blend labeled as Old Vine Wine, Serious is velvety in texture with supple tannins and a complex taste of blueberry compote and cinnamon spice. With a brightness on the finish, it'll age and be interesting with food like venison or other game.
Refined-description: Technically Zin blend labeled Old Vine Wine Serious velvety texture supple tannin complex taste blueberry compote cinnamon spice With brightness finish age interesting food like venison game

description: Dryness, acidity and minerality mark this Chardonnay. It's elegant, with Meyer lemon, lime and new French oak flavors that bring a rich note of buttered toast. The score is lifted by the wine's balance. Drink now–2018.
Refined-description: Dryness acidity minerality mark Chardonnay It elegant Meyer lemon lime new French oak flavor bring rich note buttered toast The score lifted wine balance Drink now–2018

description: The Napa-ness of this Pinot makes it so interesting. Grown in a warmer climate, it's dry, soft and somewhat herbal, with red currant, cola, tea, cranberry and mushroom notes. It feels complex in the mouth, without the flash and dazzle of more coastal bottlings, but there's a lot going on. Drink now–2017.
Refined-description: The Napaness Pinot make interesting Grown warmer climate dry soft somewhat herbal red currant cola tea cranberry mushroom note It feel complex mouth without flash dazzle coastal bottlings lot going Drink now–2017

description: It takes a certain trust in the ageability of a young Calera Pinot Noir to appreciate it, as evidenced by this bottling. It's dry and tannic, with acid-inflected raspberry jam and oak flavors that show little in the way of complexity. Yet there are earthy, herbal, minerally depths. Granted that the vintage was difficult, this still is a wine to age. Try after 2017.
Refined-description: It take certain trust ageability young Calera Pinot Noir appreciate evidenced bottling It dry tannic acidinflected raspberry jam oak flavor show little way complexity Yet earthy herbal minerally depth Granted vintage difficult still wine age Try 2017

description: Bright and delicious, this starts with aromas of blue flower, red berries, mint and thyme together with a whiff of leather. The juicy palate offers wild cherry and strawberry accented with cinnamon-spice alongside fresh acidity and firm but fine tannins. Drink now through 2016 to capture the fresh, crunchy berry character.
Refined-description: Bright delicious start aroma blue flower red berry mint thyme together whiff leather The juicy palate offer wild cherry strawberry accented cinnamonspice alongside fresh acidity firm fine tannin Drink 2016 capture fresh crunchy berry character

description: Some bottle age gives a toasty character to the ripe fruit and lively acidity, adding extra complexity to this rich wine. The citrus and apple acidity are woven together in a tight, mature structure.
Refined-description: Some bottle age give toasty character ripe fruit lively acidity adding extra complexity rich wine The citrus apple acidity woven together tight mature structure

description: This firm and structured wine also has full-on ripe, jammy fruits. The combination gives weight, richness and structure. A touch of licorice adds an extra dimension to this fruity, firm wine. Drink from 2017.
Refined-description: This firm structured wine also fullon ripe jammy fruit The combination give weight richness structure A touch licorice add extra dimension fruity firm wine Drink 2017

description: In this complex wine, surface fruitiness doesn't mask the firm layers of tannins that give shape and density. It's full of black plum flavors that show a juicy side to what is also a wine for long-term aging. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: In complex wine surface fruitiness nt mask firm layer tannin give shape density It full black plum flavor show juicy side also wine longterm aging Drink 2018

description: A mix of ripe black fruits and dense tannins characterize this young wine. Its structure is surrounded by rich fruits, smoothly textured and generous. Acidity gives the wine a fresh touch in its aftertaste. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: A mix ripe black fruit dense tannin characterize young wine Its structure surrounded rich fruit smoothly textured generous Acidity give wine fresh touch aftertaste Drink 2016

description: Attractive floral aromas of Spanish broom come together with whiffs of pear and mineral. The round but refined palate delivers ripe golden apple, mineral, peach and almond alongside bright acidity. Enjoy now for crisp flavors or hold until 2016 for added complexity.
Refined-description: Attractive floral aroma Spanish broom come together whiff pear mineral The round refined palate delivers ripe golden apple mineral peach almond alongside bright acidity Enjoy crisp flavor hold 2016 added complexity

description: Juicy flavors of white peach, green apple, pear and exotic fruit team with hints of mineral and white almond. The creamy palate is energized by crisp, quenching acidity that leaves a clean finish.
Refined-description: Juicy flavor white peach green apple pear exotic fruit team hint mineral white almond The creamy palate energized crisp quenching acidity leaf clean finish

description: This 100% Cabernet deserves its reserve status. Compared to the regular 2011, it's richer, with a smoothly tannic mouthfeel framing blackberry, black currant and cedar flavors. It will hold in the bottle until 2018, but there's no reason not to pop the cork now.
Refined-description: This 100 Cabernet deserves reserve status Compared regular 2011 richer smoothly tannic mouthfeel framing blackberry black currant cedar flavor It hold bottle 2018 reason pop cork

description: This is a powerfully wood-aged wine, rich and smoothly textured. Full of ripe yellow fruits with a hint of lemon and full-bodied, it is still developing. A touch of minerality and a steely edge add interest and further complexity. It needs to age, so wait until 2016.
designation: Aguia Moura em Vinhas Velhas Reserva
Refined-description: This powerfully woodaged wine rich smoothly textured Full ripe yellow fruit hint lemon fullbodied still developing A touch minerality steely edge add interest complexity It need age wait 2016

description: This is a rich, fruity and juicy wine. Great swathes of blackberry combine with acidity and a solid core of tannins. Full of power, with a dense texture, this already delicious wine has some medium-term aging potential. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: This rich fruity juicy wine Great swathe blackberry combine acidity solid core tannin Full power dense texture already delicious wine mediumterm aging potential Drink 2016

description: Dark in color and deeply flavored, as the name suggests, this blend has evocative blackberry, currant, grilled meat, black pepper and oak flavors. It's also tannic, suggesting cellaring until 2019.
Refined-description: Dark color deeply flavored name suggests blend evocative blackberry currant grilled meat black pepper oak flavor It also tannic suggesting cellaring 2019

description: A full-bodied wine, it shows strong vanilla flavor from oak aging and a rich, tropical feel. Lime and other citrus fruits give a crisp edge to this rounded wine that has concentration and final fruitiness. Drink from 2015.
Refined-description: A fullbodied wine show strong vanilla flavor oak aging rich tropical feel Lime citrus fruit give crisp edge rounded wine concentration final fruitiness Drink 2015

description: Made from Syrah and Grenache, this shows rich, fruity flavors of raspberries, cherries, figs and mocha, but perhaps the best thing is the acidity. It's clean, bright, savory and easy to drink.
Refined-description: Made Syrah Grenache show rich fruity flavor raspberry cherry fig mocha perhaps best thing acidity It clean bright savory easy drink

description: The acidity is like a double squeeze of lime juice. It gets the tastebuds whistling, which allowss the intense lemon, lime and mango flavors to spread across the mouth and sink deep into the palate. This zesty wine needs rich fare. Ahi tuna tartare is perfect.
Refined-description: The acidity like double squeeze lime juice It get tastebud whistling allowss intense lemon lime mango flavor spread across mouth sink deep palate This zesty wine need rich fare Ahi tuna tartare perfect

description: Delicately perfumed with notes of lemon, tart stone fruit and white florals, this off-dry Riesling builds in intensity and ripeness on the palate. It's lushly textured, with flavors of fleshy peach and apricot that are brightened by lemon-lime acidity.
Refined-description: Delicately perfumed note lemon tart stone fruit white florals offdry Riesling build intensity ripeness palate It lushly textured flavor fleshy peach apricot brightened lemonlime acidity

description: Lushly textured and expansive on the palate, this dry Riesling melds flavors of waxy lemon skins with notes of rich honey and saffron. The acidity is sunny and bright, highlighting hints of tangerine and lime on the finish.
Refined-description: Lushly textured expansive palate dry Riesling meld flavor waxy lemon skin note rich honey saffron The acidity sunny bright highlighting hint tangerine lime finish

description: Refreshing aromas of tangerine and lime are laced with petrol on this steely kabinett. Waves of ripe peach and nectarine flavor add delicate sweetness on the palate, accented by savory notes of dried herb and tea leaves. Lemon-lime acidity leads the long finish.
Refined-description: Refreshing aroma tangerine lime laced petrol steely kabinett Waves ripe peach nectarine flavor add delicate sweetness palate accented savory note dried herb tea leaf Lemonlime acidity lead long finish

description: Enticing aromas of blackberry, bramble and wet leaves meld on the nose of this elegant, nuanced Spätburgunder. It's concentrated and juicy, with black cherry flavor, but invigorated by a stream of laser-like acidity that carries through the finish. It ends with a pretty violet accent.
Refined-description: Enticing aroma blackberry bramble wet leaf meld nose elegant nuanced Spätburgunder It concentrated juicy black cherry flavor invigorated stream laserlike acidity carry finish It end pretty violet accent

description: Aromas of Key lime skins and lemon bar cookies hide a slight but typical petrol note on this wine from the San Diego County-based producer. It's slightly sour on the citrusy palate, with balanced acidity and a chalky grip.
designation: The Augur Kick On Ranch Vineyard
Refined-description: Aromas Key lime skin lemon bar cooky hide slight typical petrol note wine San Diego Countybased producer It slightly sour citrusy palate balanced acidity chalky grip

description: Petal pink in the glass, this wine was specifically grown to be a rosé by winemaker David Galzignato. The nose is pretty with bubble gum, strawberry, raspberry and a bit of lime peel, and the palate offers flavors of ruby-red grapefruit and lemon juice, with bright acidity throughout.
Refined-description: Petal pink glass wine specifically grown rosé winemaker David Galzignato The nose pretty bubble gum strawberry raspberry bit lime peel palate offer flavor rubyred grapefruit lemon juice bright acidity throughout

description: Delicious fruit aromas and flavors define this medium bodied and very smooth blend that is 50% Graciano grapes. Aromas convey floral notes, strawberries and oranges, while the flavors bring more strawberries and cherries. The texture is not light but the wine is still extremely easy to sip.
Refined-description: Delicious fruit aroma flavor define medium bodied smooth blend 50 Graciano grape Aromas convey floral note strawberry orange flavor bring strawberry cherry The texture light wine still extremely easy sip

description: The Central Coast's pioneering sparkling house offers a quite-pink bubbly with aromas of lemonade, yeast, white rocks and ruby-red grapefruit flesh. The palate shows sour strawberry and lime zest.
Refined-description: The Central Coast pioneering sparkling house offer quitepink bubbly aroma lemonade yeast white rock rubyred grapefruit flesh The palate show sour strawberry lime zest

description: From a hilltop location near the ocean-influenced town of Freestone, this wine is silky in plum and dark cherry, a hint of mushroomed earth doing its best to come out. Robust on the palate, juicy berry fruit satisfies, finishing thick and rich.
Refined-description: From hilltop location near oceaninfluenced town Freestone wine silky plum dark cherry hint mushroomed earth best come Robust palate juicy berry fruit satisfies finishing thick rich

description: A tremendous value, this white is light and floral, soft in honeyed stone fruit and pineapple. A nice minerality buoys the proceedings, a medium-body taking on new strength midway through before letting the wine finish crisp and clean.
Refined-description: A tremendous value white light floral soft honeyed stone fruit pineapple A nice minerality buoy proceeding mediumbody taking new strength midway letting wine finish crisp clean

description: Red currant, vanilla, toasted oak, coffee and chocolate aromas lead the nose and follow through to the dense, full-bodied palate. It's one-dimensional but muscular, with ample, velvety tannins.
Refined-description: Red currant vanilla toasted oak coffee chocolate aroma lead nose follow dense fullbodied palate It onedimensional muscular ample velvety tannin

description: Aromas of underbrush, blue flowers, cooking spice and black plum unfold in the glass. A blend of 50% Sangiovese and 50% Malvasia Nera, the palate reveals dried black cherry, black pepper and anise alongside firm, polished tannins. Drink through 2017.
Refined-description: Aromas underbrush blue flower cooking spice black plum unfold glass A blend 50 Sangiovese 50 Malvasia Nera palate reveals dried black cherry black pepper anise alongside firm polished tannin Drink 2017

description: A blend of 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, this sleek wine opens with aromas of red currant, bell pepper and herbs. On the juicy palate, notes of white pepper and clove add interest to crushed strawberry and cassis. Tangy acidity and polished tannins provide the framework.
Refined-description: A blend 60 Merlot 40 Cabernet Sauvignon sleek wine open aroma red currant bell pepper herb On juicy palate note white pepper clove add interest crushed strawberry cassis Tangy acidity polished tannin provide framework

description: A complex blend of five grapes, this is a textured and fruity wine that is impressively fresh and crisp. Apples, strong citrus and apricots are all present in this tight, mineral wine. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: A complex blend five grape textured fruity wine impressively fresh crisp Apples strong citrus apricot present tight mineral wine Drink 2016

description: This opens with damp, rubbery plum aromas. The palate is spunky and offers live-wire acidity, with cherry, raspberry, toast and pepper flavors balancing it out. Speckled black pepper comes on the dry finish.
Refined-description: This open damp rubbery plum aroma The palate spunky offer livewire acidity cherry raspberry toast pepper flavor balancing Speckled black pepper come dry finish

description: Beautifully purple-pink in color, this blend of 46% Mourvèdre, 41% Grenache and 13% Counoise shows smashed plums and watermelon extract on the nose. The acidity hits the palate first as does a grippy white rock minerality, with pomegranate fruits showing rather ripely.
Refined-description: Beautifully purplepink color blend 46 Mourvèdre 41 Grenache 13 Counoise show smashed plum watermelon extract nose The acidity hit palate first grippy white rock minerality pomegranate fruit showing rather ripely

description: Aromas of vanilla, prune and nutmeg lead the nose on this robust Merlot. The dense, monolithic palate offers raisin, leather and licorice alongside the heat of evident alcohol and drying tannins. It's shy on freshness and fruit richness so drink sooner rather than later.
Refined-description: Aromas vanilla prune nutmeg lead nose robust Merlot The dense monolithic palate offer raisin leather licorice alongside heat evident alcohol drying tannin It shy freshness fruit richness drink sooner rather later

description: Round and fruity, this is big, forward and loaded with ripe stone fruit, melon and a finishing lick of citrus. Fresh and lively, it's ready for immediate enjoyment.
Refined-description: Round fruity big forward loaded ripe stone fruit melon finishing lick citrus Fresh lively ready immediate enjoyment

description: While the wine has some concentration from the old vines, its general effect is of a soft, open and generous texture that is full and rounded. There is some spice, a touch of toast and full-bodied blackberry and currant flavors. Drink now.
Refined-description: While wine concentration old vine general effect soft open generous texture full rounded There spice touch toast fullbodied blackberry currant flavor Drink

description: Concentrated aromas of plum and black currant come with a leathery, earthy accent. Dense, jammy and ripe in feel, this features blackberry, baked plum and chocolate flavors. A licorice note and controlled heat rise up on a powerful finish.
Refined-description: Concentrated aroma plum black currant come leathery earthy accent Dense jammy ripe feel feature blackberry baked plum chocolate flavor A licorice note controlled heat rise powerful finish

description: Bruised apricot, lemonade and citrus rind-laden marzipan notes hit the nose on this wine, which is showing just a touch of nutty, honeyed oxidization. The macadamia nut element arises on the palate too, alongside intriguingly peaty flavors reminiscent of Scotch, with almond liqueur on the outro. It presents decent acidity throughout.
Refined-description: Bruised apricot lemonade citrus rindladen marzipan note hit nose wine showing touch nutty honeyed oxidization The macadamia nut element arises palate alongside intriguingly peaty flavor reminiscent Scotch almond liqueur outro It present decent acidity throughout

description: This is a dark and concentrated wine, solid with dark plum skin tannins and a dense structure. A fresher side brings in spice and a tense texture of both freshness and acidity. It should age a couple of years more, so drink from 2017. The estate, about 31 miles from Toulouse along the Tarn river, has a well-recorded history of family ownership over many centuries and is now run by the Faramond family.
Refined-description: This dark concentrated wine solid dark plum skin tannin dense structure A fresher side brings spice tense texture freshness acidity It age couple year drink 2017 The estate 31 mile Toulouse along Tarn river wellrecorded history family ownership many century run Faramond family

description: With its 50% Sémillon, this ripe wine has the potential to be rich. It has a perfumed, fruity character at this stage, emphasizing flowery fruits along with citrus. As it develops, it will fill out comfortably. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: With 50 Sémillon ripe wine potential rich It perfumed fruity character stage emphasizing flowery fruit along citrus As develops fill comfortably Drink 2016

description: This rich, full-bodied wine is packed with ripe, dense blackberry and plum flavors. With firm tannins in the background, it is always going to be dark and solid. Produced on a single vineyard by the local cooperative, it could still age and will be best from 2016.
Refined-description: This rich fullbodied wine packed ripe dense blackberry plum flavor With firm tannin background always going dark solid Produced single vineyard local cooperative could still age best 2016

description: Made entirely from the native grape Ciliegiolo, this offers aromas of violet, allspice and wild red berry. The bright palate doles out wild cherry, crushed raspberry and a hint of clove alongside silky tannins and fresh acidity. It's easygoing and made to be enjoyed young.
Refined-description: Made entirely native grape Ciliegiolo offer aroma violet allspice wild red berry The bright palate dole wild cherry crushed raspberry hint clove alongside silky tannin fresh acidity It easygoing made enjoyed young

description: Herbal berry aromas come with plastic tones of latex and rubber band. This shows a gritty palate of hard tannins, with peppery, green-leaning, herbal flavors of black currant and black plum. A clampy, heavy finish gives this blend a lumbersome lasting impression.
Refined-description: Herbal berry aroma come plastic tone latex rubber band This show gritty palate hard tannin peppery greenleaning herbal flavor black currant black plum A clampy heavy finish give blend lumbersome lasting impression

description: Aromas of brambly plum and raspberry set up a palate with ripe flavors of black cherry and nutmeg. A baking-spice character carries onto the finish, which turns more soft and candied as it wraps up.
Refined-description: Aromas brambly plum raspberry set palate ripe flavor black cherry nutmeg A bakingspice character carry onto finish turn soft candied wrap

description: Made entirely with Merlot, this densely extracted wine opens with aromas of toasted oak, black currants and vanilla. The tightly packed palate delivers dried blackberries, tobacco, espresso and licorice alongside raspy wood tannins that leave an astringent finish. It lacks the fruit richness to stand up to the heavy oak influence.
Refined-description: Made entirely Merlot densely extracted wine open aroma toasted oak black currant vanilla The tightly packed palate delivers dried blackberry tobacco espresso licorice alongside raspy wood tannin leave astringent finish It lack fruit richness stand heavy oak influence

description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Sangiovese, Merlot and Syrah, this opens with aromas of black currant, pencil shavings, toast and a whiff of pine. Notes of mocha, graphite and anise add depth to the black cherry core alongside chewy but astringent tannins that leave a drying finish. Drink 2016–2018.
Refined-description: A blend Cabernet Sauvignon Sangiovese Merlot Syrah open aroma black currant pencil shaving toast whiff pine Notes mocha graphite anise add depth black cherry core alongside chewy astringent tannin leave drying finish Drink 2016–2018

description: Black pepper, anise, boysenberry and a bit of juniper combine for a slightly funky, somewhat reductive nose on this blend of 46% Grenache, 23% Petite Sirah, 23% Syrah, 6% Carignane and 2% Mourvèdre. There's an ample amount of blackberry jam and chopped Italian herbs on the palate, with an asphalt character in the midpalate and a somewhat tart finish.
Refined-description: Black pepper anise boysenberry bit juniper combine slightly funky somewhat reductive nose blend 46 Grenache 23 Petite Sirah 23 Syrah 6 Carignane 2 Mourvèdre There ample amount blackberry jam chopped Italian herb palate asphalt character midpalate somewhat tart finish

description: Earthy aromas of a leather, scratchy plum and a dusty country road lead to a tight feeling, rubbery palate, with flavors of herbs, baked plum and cassis. This is more fruity and ripe than leafy and spicy—overall, it's perfectly enjoyable.
Refined-description: Earthy aroma leather scratchy plum dusty country road lead tight feeling rubbery palate flavor herb baked plum cassis This fruity ripe leafy spicy—overall perfectly enjoyable

description: This super-smooth but hearty red blend made from Grenache, Syrah and Mourvèdre smells smoky, meaty and oaky. It tastes savory and a bit peppery before a good dose of ripe, plummy flavor joins in. It feels full-bodied, and almost soft in texture because of light tannins, but has enough acidity to keep an appetizing balance.
Refined-description: This supersmooth hearty red blend made Grenache Syrah Mourvèdre smell smoky meaty oaky It taste savory bit peppery good dose ripe plummy flavor join It feel fullbodied almost soft texture light tannin enough acidity keep appetizing balance

description: Refreshing and full of vitality, this Pinot Gris offsets zesty white grapefruit flavor with a sheen of fresh herb and floral notes. It's a dry, elegant wine, with broad appeal and a youthful vigor that should last through 2016.
Refined-description: Refreshing full vitality Pinot Gris offset zesty white grapefruit flavor sheen fresh herb floral note It dry elegant wine broad appeal youthful vigor last 2016

description: Easy berry and plum aromas come across clean and pure. This has a staunch mouthfeel with rubbery, pinching tannins. Earthy, ripe berry and plum flavors turn even riper on the back palate and finish, which lingers in a solid state.
Refined-description: Easy berry plum aroma come across clean pure This staunch mouthfeel rubbery pinching tannin Earthy ripe berry plum flavor turn even riper back palate finish lingers solid state

description: Licorice and blackberry scents float off the surface of this estate wine. Once sipped, a thinner juiciness takes hold, with boysenberry and cracked pepper leading the way.
Refined-description: Licorice blackberry scent float surface estate wine Once sipped thinner juiciness take hold boysenberry cracked pepper leading way

description: Fruity and lightly structured, this is a wine for drinking now. It has great juicy fruitiness, soft tannins and an immediately drinkable character, great for barbecues. The wine is named after the Fado Portugal's national music, songs  by seamen longing for home.
Refined-description: Fruity lightly structured wine drinking It great juicy fruitiness soft tannin immediately drinkable character great barbecue The wine named Fado Portugal national music song seaman longing home

description: Elegant and compact, it offers appealing flavors that call to mind a cherry popsickle—fruity, with palate-cleansing freshness. The wine does a gentle fade, perhaps more quickly than you'd wish.
Refined-description: Elegant compact offer appealing flavor call mind cherry popsickle—fruity palatecleansing freshness The wine gentle fade perhaps quickly wish

description: Firmly tannic and dense, this dry wine is dedicated to the winemakers at Vidigal, the authors in the name of the wine. It has berry fruits under its dark texture, promising more fruit in the next several years. There is a show of wood aging as well as acidity at the end.  Screwcap.

description: Balanced toward the bold side, it's full-bodied and shows aromas of ripe grapes and sage, accompanied by flavors of cherry and plum. Layers of fine tannin give it grip without bitterness. Tasty cherry and baking spice flavors linger on the finish.

description: Hanzell took on a new barrel regime with the 2011 vintage, opening the door to several different coopers to taste over time. Loaded with rustic charm, it has more power than complexity.

In this ode to generations gone by, the grower and winemaker find common ground in showcasing a big-bodied, black-purple expression of fig, plum and grippy leather that lands softly on the palate.

description: This Bulgarian Pinot Noir offers the nose black and red cherries and dried violets. It is well balanced in the mouth with soft, rounded tannins and flavors of dark cherry, cranberry and dried Mediterranean herbs.
