description: Exuberant, ripe fruit flavor energizes this medium-bodied yet smooth and fresh-textured wine. Shadings of spicy oak add complexity.  The freshness and fruit will make a great pairing with spiced meats.
Refined-description: Exuberant ripe fruit flavor energizes mediumbodied yet smooth freshtextured wine Shadings spicy oak add complexity The freshness fruit make great pairing spiced meat

description: Raspberry and plum aromas are woody and narrow in scope. This Cabernet is medium in body but also a bit sticky and resiny. Candied blackberry and black cherry flavors are slightly medicinal, while the finish is oaky, with a lactic flavor and a touch of heat.
Refined-description: Raspberry plum aroma woody narrow scope This Cabernet medium body also bit sticky resiny Candied blackberry black cherry flavor slightly medicinal finish oaky lactic flavor touch heat

description: This brightly aromatic wine suggests lime leaf, clover, wet stone and orange blossom. It drinks off dry (24 g/L residual sugar) with a broad feel and a narrowing finish.
Refined-description: This brightly aromatic wine suggests lime leaf clover wet stone orange blossom It drink dry 24 gL residual sugar broad feel narrowing finish

description: Cardamom and vanilla lend warmth and spice to fresh black cherry and blueberry flavors in this sprightly wine. It's rich and ripe in fruit concentration, but delicately textured with a brisk, spry finish.
Refined-description: Cardamom vanilla lend warmth spice fresh black cherry blueberry flavor sprightly wine It rich ripe fruit concentration delicately textured brisk spry finish

description: Aromatically distinctive, this suggests dry chocolate, orange peel and tart cherries. Flavors are on the lighter side of medium bodied, soft in feel with abundant umami flavors and tart acids.
Refined-description: Aromatically distinctive suggests dry chocolate orange peel tart cherry Flavors lighter side medium bodied soft feel abundant umami flavor tart acid

description: Herbal and foresty up front, this Bordeaux blend smells of fig, caramel and berry fruits. Big, tannic and chunky on the palate, this has toasty, chocolaty, burnt flavors and a blackened finish. This offers a lot of power and fruit but it's brusk.
Refined-description: Herbal foresty front Bordeaux blend smell fig caramel berry fruit Big tannic chunky palate toasty chocolaty burnt flavor blackened finish This offer lot power fruit brusk

description: Blended from several stellar vineyard sites, including La Cruz and Devoto, this wine presents a brightness of acidity and crisp, red fruit. These are offset by a heartier uptake of oak and tannin that feels out of place compared to many of the producer's single-vineyard offerings. On the finish, expect tart cranberry and pomegranate to peak.
Refined-description: Blended several stellar vineyard site including La Cruz Devoto wine present brightness acidity crisp red fruit These offset heartier uptake oak tannin feel place compared many producer singlevineyard offering On finish expect tart cranberry pomegranate peak

description: Equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot finished off with 5% Cabernet Franc, this cool-vintage wine is light in color. Notes of plum and cranberries come with herb and floral accents. It's light and lively with elegant, pretty fruit flavors backed by mouthwatering acidity with a lingering finish.
Refined-description: Equal part Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot finished 5 Cabernet Franc coolvintage wine light color Notes plum cranberry come herb floral accent It light lively elegant pretty fruit flavor backed mouthwatering acidity lingering finish

description: A very subtle aroma leads to a rich feel on the palate, where ripe plum and soft berry flavors emerge. This wine is totally smooth, warm and plush, full bodied but with soft tannins that make it easy to sip.
Refined-description: A subtle aroma lead rich feel palate ripe plum soft berry flavor emerge This wine totally smooth warm plush full bodied soft tannin make easy sip

description: Scents of lemon-cake icing meet the pretty yet not treacly tropical aromatics of white flowers on this barely off-dry wine. The sweetness is noticeable on the palate but far from overdone, with clean flavors of lemon custard, tangerine juice and a Key-lime finish.
Refined-description: Scents lemoncake icing meet pretty yet treacly tropical aromatics white flower barely offdry wine The sweetness noticeable palate far overdone clean flavor lemon custard tangerine juice Keylime finish

description: This smells oaky and tastes ripe and pure, like crushed blackberries and raspberries. It feels plush and smooth in the mouth, finishing on the soft side. While medium bodied, it has just a touch of tannin to balance the ripeness and make it appetizing to drink.
Refined-description: This smell oaky taste ripe pure like crushed blackberry raspberry It feel plush smooth mouth finishing soft side While medium bodied touch tannin balance ripeness make appetizing drink

description: Damp earth and forest floor mark this wine, a blend of various clones, the majority of which are Pommard. Red raspberry and cherry compete for attention aromatically and in taste, followed by a spiciness of Christmas clove.
Refined-description: Damp earth forest floor mark wine blend various clone majority Pommard Red raspberry cherry compete attention aromatically taste followed spiciness Christmas clove

description: This tastes honest, clean and direct, with a nice mixture of fruity, woody and savory herbal aromas and flavors. It's medium in body and offers just a touch of tannin to add a little grip to the texture. A tasty raspberry note gives it even more personality.
Refined-description: This taste honest clean direct nice mixture fruity woody savory herbal aroma flavor It medium body offer touch tannin add little grip texture A tasty raspberry note give even personality

description: This warm-climate wine is fulsome and hearty in baked Asian pear and candied ginger. A dried-fruit quality stands out on the buxom palate, a buttery taste of dried apricot drizzled in honey and brioche.
Refined-description: This warmclimate wine fulsome hearty baked Asian pear candied ginger A driedfruit quality stand buxom palate buttery taste dried apricot drizzled honey brioche

description: This aromatic wine offers notes of jasmine, quinine, flowers and peach. It drinks medium sweet with lightly spritzy stone-fruit flavors.
Refined-description: This aromatic wine offer note jasmine quinine flower peach It drink medium sweet lightly spritzy stonefruit flavor

description: One of the many chateaus with vines on the wide valley floor of the Dordogne, this estate has made a lightly extracted wine that has chocolate as well as blackberry stalkiness. There's freshness as well, with fruit acidity that cuts through the mineral texture. Drink from 2018.
Refined-description: One many chateau vine wide valley floor Dordogne estate made lightly extracted wine chocolate well blackberry stalkiness There freshness well fruit acidity cut mineral texture Drink 2018

description: Fruity, soft and ripe, this is almost ready to drink. Attractive berry fruits are touched by a smoky character from the wood aging. Balancing Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot equally, the wine has ripe tannins and a gentle, juicy aftertaste. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: Fruity soft ripe almost ready drink Attractive berry fruit touched smoky character wood aging Balancing Cabernet Sauvignon Merlot equally wine ripe tannin gentle juicy aftertaste Drink 2016

description: This smoky wine has firm tannins and a tough core. The juicy fruit is taking its time to develop, although it will give the wine density and ripe berries in time. The vineyard, created in the early 1980s is now at peak maturity. Drink from 2017.
Refined-description: This smoky wine firm tannin tough core The juicy fruit taking time develop although give wine density ripe berry time The vineyard created early 1980s peak maturity Drink 2017

description: This wine is smooth and ripe, with soft tannins that are already so well integrated. The texture is dense, full of blackberry fruits, full in the mouth and with a velvet final texture. Drink from 2017.
Refined-description: This wine smooth ripe soft tannin already well integrated The texture dense full blackberry fruit full mouth velvet final texture Drink 2017

description: Fifty-year-old vines are the backbone to this firm wine. Mint and smoky wood-aging flavors give a dry, dense character. Underneath the Cabernet tannins and black currant fruit are developing well. This is a wine for the medium-term, drink from 2017.
Refined-description: Fiftyyearold vine backbone firm wine Mint smoky woodaging flavor give dry dense character Underneath Cabernet tannin black currant fruit developing well This wine mediumterm drink 2017

description: Coming from the warm 2013 vintage, this easy-drinking wine offers notes of sweet corn, pear and peach with light barrel accents. The fruit flavors are elegant with a lightly creamy feel.
Refined-description: Coming warm 2013 vintage easydrinking wine offer note sweet corn pear peach light barrel accent The fruit flavor elegant lightly creamy feel

description: Chocolate, coconut, plum and coffee aromas lead the nose on this densely concentrated wine. The monolithic palate offers black cherry, chocolate-covered coconut and oak alongside astringent tannins that dry out the mouth.
Refined-description: Chocolate coconut plum coffee aroma lead nose densely concentrated wine The monolithic palate offer black cherry chocolatecovered coconut oak alongside astringent tannin dry mouth

description: Milk chocolate and pomegranate curiously mix in this mid-weight, lowly oaked nonvintage Cabernet, blended with 18% Merlot and 2% Petite Sirah. New American oak aged most of it, with a bit of French, too, only 25% of the whole new.
Refined-description: Milk chocolate pomegranate curiously mix midweight lowly oaked nonvintage Cabernet blended 18 Merlot 2 Petite Sirah New American oak aged bit French 25 whole new

description: This is the first release from a new, two-acre vineyard devoted to this old-school clone. It's what might be called sculpted, with excellent definition among all the components. Pomegranate and raspberry fruit carry a hint of pine needle, and the finish carries  through with good focus and medium length.
Refined-description: This first release new twoacre vineyard devoted oldschool clone It might called sculpted excellent definition among component Pomegranate raspberry fruit carry hint pine needle finish carry good focus medium length

description: Ripe, heady tropical fruit and citrus aromas extend onto the palate of this dry, yet deeply fruity, concentrated Riesling. It's unabashedly juicy, but textured and mineral on the palate, finishing long and with a streak of high-toned acidity.
Refined-description: Ripe heady tropical fruit citrus aroma extend onto palate dry yet deeply fruity concentrated Riesling It unabashedly juicy textured mineral palate finishing long streak hightoned acidity

description: Crisp in green apple and lemon, this light Chardonnay, only 12.4% in alcohol, will sweep you off your feet with Thai food, seafood or as a before-dinner quaff. From an un-grafted, old Wente clone vineyard found abandoned (thus the name), it has a trace of salinity throughout and a lurking layer of Asian spice.
Refined-description: Crisp green apple lemon light Chardonnay 124 alcohol sweep foot Thai food seafood beforedinner quaff From ungrafted old Wente clone vineyard found abandoned thus name trace salinity throughout lurking layer Asian spice

description: Intense aromas include crushed tomato vine, elderflowers, hay and tropical fruit. The vibrant palate offers yellow peach, kiwi, honeydew melon and a hint of lemon pastry alongside crisp acidity.
Refined-description: Intense aroma include crushed tomato vine elderflowers hay tropical fruit The vibrant palate offer yellow peach kiwi honeydew melon hint lemon pastry alongside crisp acidity

description: This savory wine opens with a heady fragrance of rose and lychee. The linear, steely palate offers rich tropical fruit and a saline note brightened by energizing mineral sensations. It has nice length and finishes dry. Oliver McCrum, T. Edward Wines.
Refined-description: This savory wine open heady fragrance rose lychee The linear steely palate offer rich tropical fruit saline note brightened energizing mineral sensation It nice length finish dry Oliver McCrum T Edward Wines

description: Aromas of exotic fruit, green melon and crushed tomato vine carry over to the palate along with a mineral note. The vibrant acidity gives a linear character and a clean, focused finish. Oliver McCrum, T. Edward Wines.
Refined-description: Aromas exotic fruit green melon crushed tomato vine carry palate along mineral note The vibrant acidity give linear character clean focused finish Oliver McCrum T Edward Wines

description: Some ageable Cabs are lovely to drink on release. Not this one. It's tough in tannins, with a gum-stinging astringency. Below all that are ripe, concentrated blackberry jam and cassis flavors. Blended with Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, it's already throwing some sediment, a good sign, which means you won't have to wait 20 years for it to come around. Pop that cork after 2018.
Refined-description: Some ageable Cabs lovely drink release Not one It tough tannin gumstinging astringency Below ripe concentrated blackberry jam cassis flavor Blended Merlot Cabernet Franc Petit Verdot already throwing sediment good sign mean wo nt wait 20 year come around Pop cork 2018

description: This structured Pinot Grigio boasts aromas of yellow spring flowers, exotic fruit, citrus and a hint of Alpine herbs. The juicy, vibrant palate delivers green apple, pear, white peach and citrus allied with fresh acidity.
Refined-description: This structured Pinot Grigio boast aroma yellow spring flower exotic fruit citrus hint Alpine herb The juicy vibrant palate delivers green apple pear white peach citrus allied fresh acidity

description: This Merlot is dry, full-bodied and delicious in fruit and oak. Black cherries, currants, mocha, plums, vanilla and fragrant sandalwood all come together to provide a complex drink that's firm in tannins and fancy in the finish. Drink now.
Refined-description: This Merlot dry fullbodied delicious fruit oak Black cherry currant mocha plum vanilla fragrant sandalwood come together provide complex drink firm tannin fancy finish Drink

description: There's something old-fashioned about this blend of all five classic Bordeaux varieties. Partly it's the tannins, which are brusque, and partly it's the alcohol, which is low. On the other hand, the fruit is ripe in the modern style, brimming with raspberries and cherries, and there's plenty of fancy new French oak. It's a pretty wine to drink now through 2020.
Refined-description: There something oldfashioned blend five classic Bordeaux variety Partly tannin brusque partly alcohol low On hand fruit ripe modern style brimming raspberry cherry plenty fancy new French oak It pretty wine drink 2020

description: Hints of menthol and bramble meld with rich black-plum and cherry notes in this composed Pinot Noir. It's juicy and concentrated in black fruit flavors, but graced with a spray of delicate floral notes and brisk, revitalizing acidity. Soft, fine tannins square off the finish.
Refined-description: Hints menthol bramble meld rich blackplum cherry note composed Pinot Noir It juicy concentrated black fruit flavor graced spray delicate floral note brisk revitalizing acidity Soft fine tannin square finish

description: Musky floral, spice and cherry-blossom notes meld in the exuberant bouquet of this aromatic auslese. It's blossomy on the palate as well, and luscious, with sweet peach and yellow cherry flavors. It's unabashedly lavish, but balanced by a streak of citrus acidity and a long, lingering finish.
Refined-description: Musky floral spice cherryblossom note meld exuberant bouquet aromatic auslese It blossomy palate well luscious sweet peach yellow cherry flavor It unabashedly lavish balanced streak citrus acidity long lingering finish

description: Ebullient on the nose, with scents of mango, lemongrass and yellow flowers, this off-dry Riesling is intensely tropical in style, but elegant as well, with searing lime acidity that cuts through layers of juicy, ripe fruit and finishes remarkably dry.
Refined-description: Ebullient nose scent mango lemongrass yellow flower offdry Riesling intensely tropical style elegant well searing lime acidity cut layer juicy ripe fruit finish remarkably dry

description: This wine shows ripeness, depth and purity. In the mouth, it is saturated and thick. Flavors of saffron, tomato paste, oregano and stewed berry fruits are pure Kankana. A different breed of Syrah, it reflects San Pedro's pioneering efforts in the Elqui Valley.
Refined-description: This wine show ripeness depth purity In mouth saturated thick Flavors saffron tomato paste oregano stewed berry fruit pure Kankana A different breed Syrah reflects San Pedro pioneering effort Elqui Valley

description: Whiffs of freshly pressed apples are accented by pretty peach and honeysuckle notes on this dry, refreshing Riesling. The palate is lean in style, with subtle stone-fruit flavors that feel brisk and vivacious against a backdrop of pineapple acidity.
Refined-description: Whiffs freshly pressed apple accented pretty peach honeysuckle note dry refreshing Riesling The palate lean style subtle stonefruit flavor feel brisk vivacious backdrop pineapple acidity

description: There's a savory vein of herbs and smoke that persists from start to finish on this deeply fruity auslese, adding a shade of dimension and complexity. It's zippy in lemony acidity, but silky and sweet, with luscious flavors of preserved peach and tangerine.
Refined-description: There savory vein herb smoke persists start finish deeply fruity auslese adding shade dimension complexity It zippy lemony acidity silky sweet luscious flavor preserved peach tangerine

description: This powerful Pinot, from one of the three distinct blocks within Black Kite's estate vineyard, offers earthy plum compote and blueberry with a lingering background note of vanilla. Bright, grippy and layered, the finish offers toasty oak.
Refined-description: This powerful Pinot one three distinct block within Black Kite estate vineyard offer earthy plum compote blueberry lingering background note vanilla Bright grippy layered finish offer toasty oak

description: Structured and elegant, it delivers aromas of white flowers, stone fruit and almonds. The juicy fruit palate recalls yellow peach, apricot and pineapple while aromatic herbs and white almond add depth.
Refined-description: Structured elegant delivers aroma white flower stone fruit almond The juicy fruit palate recall yellow peach apricot pineapple aromatic herb white almond add depth

description: A rich, perfumed and juicy wine, it is full of fruit and also solidly structured. Coming into balance, it still needs some more time. Give this full-bodied, dense wine until 2017.
Refined-description: A rich perfumed juicy wine full fruit also solidly structured Coming balance still need time Give fullbodied dense wine 2017

description: A dark and brooding wine, it's very much a Malbec that needs to age. Solid tannins, berry fruits and concentrated structure all promise a serious wine that needs time to mature. Drink from 2017.
Refined-description: A dark brooding wine much Malbec need age Solid tannin berry fruit concentrated structure promise serious wine need time mature Drink 2017

description: This impressive wood-aged wine has weight, rich black and red berry flavors and a smooth, unctuous texture. With its concentration, ripeness, acidity and tannins, it could age through 2016.
Refined-description: This impressive woodaged wine weight rich black red berry flavor smooth unctuous texture With concentration ripeness acidity tannin could age 2016

description: Given the difficulties of the 2010 vintage, this wine is a success. The tannins are young, thick and astringent, and then the acids kick in. After that initial assault, the palate begins to get more interesting complexities of black currants, blueberries, minerals and oak. The suggestion is ageability, but only limited. Give it until 2016–2017 years and drink with hearty fare.
Refined-description: Given difficulty 2010 vintage wine success The tannin young thick astringent acid kick After initial assault palate begin get interesting complexity black currant blueberry mineral oak The suggestion ageability limited Give 2016–2017 year drink hearty fare

description: Dense and structured, this is a firm wine from the Santar estate. It is powered by its tannins and partnered with ripe black plum fruits. There is a feeling of tough rocks, a dry core that need some time. Drink from 2015.
Refined-description: Dense structured firm wine Santar estate It powered tannin partnered ripe black plum fruit There feeling tough rock dry core need time Drink 2015

description: This complex, ripe wine reflects the steely character of Dão whites along with perfumed acidity and rich white fruit flavors. Lime, apples and pears are smoothed by wood aging and given a final burst of freshness. It's ready to drink.
Refined-description: This complex ripe wine reflects steely character Dão white along perfumed acidity rich white fruit flavor Lime apple pear smoothed wood aging given final burst freshness It ready drink

description: Gritty aromas of berry fruits, wild herbs and leather are hardly shy. This has a lot of energy and acidity across the palate, while flavors of blackberry, plum and coffee finish ripe, baked and rich, with a slight raisiny note. Enjoy with grilled beef or lamb.
Refined-description: Gritty aroma berry fruit wild herb leather hardly shy This lot energy acidity across palate flavor blackberry plum coffee finish ripe baked rich slight raisiny note Enjoy grilled beef lamb

description: Here's a Pinot Grigio for grownups. It opens with aromas of white flowers, Granny Smith apple and a hint of flint. The palate delivers creamy peach, apple and melon alongside a touch of vanilla. It conveys wonderful depth and freshness.
Refined-description: Here Pinot Grigio grownup It open aroma white flower Granny Smith apple hint flint The palate delivers creamy peach apple melon alongside touch vanilla It conveys wonderful depth freshness

description: A small planting of an unusual “Upright” clone yields this fragrant, smoky, lightly earthy Pinot Noir. Chock full of briary red fruits, it's a tart, lip-smacking wine, drinking well in its youth, but also positioned (via bracing acidity) for further years of bottle age. The young fruit gives a pretty, cherry candy note to the finish.
Refined-description: A small planting unusual “ Upright ” clone yield fragrant smoky lightly earthy Pinot Noir Chock full briary red fruit tart lipsmacking wine drinking well youth also positioned via bracing acidity year bottle age The young fruit give pretty cherry candy note finish

description: This is a tannic, acidic, hard-to-appreciate wine due to the cold conditions of the 2011 vintage. But the wine, which is 100% Cabernet and was aged in 50% new French oak, still is a great success, testimony to skillful viticultural and winemaking practices. With a solid core of black currants, it wants until 2020 in the cellar.
Refined-description: This tannic acidic hardtoappreciate wine due cold condition 2011 vintage But wine 100 Cabernet aged 50 new French oak still great success testimony skillful viticultural winemaking practice With solid core black currant want 2020 cellar

description: Full bodied, this opens with aromas of vanilla, butterscotch, citrus and oak. The palate offers ripe golden apple, pear and lemon pastry, all layered with well-integrated oak. The rich flavors are balanced by fresh acidity.
Refined-description: Full bodied open aroma vanilla butterscotch citrus oak The palate offer ripe golden apple pear lemon pastry layered wellintegrated oak The rich flavor balanced fresh acidity

description: Despite showing raspy rawness on the nose, this Cab Franc is also aromatic with earth, spice, leather and leafy black fruits. The palate is tannic and slightly reduced, while flavors of baked berry, licorice, hard spices and chocolate finish herbal, peppery and gritty in feel due to residual tannic grab. Drink through 2017.
Refined-description: Despite showing raspy rawness nose Cab Franc also aromatic earth spice leather leafy black fruit The palate tannic slightly reduced flavor baked berry licorice hard spice chocolate finish herbal peppery gritty feel due residual tannic grab Drink 2017

description: Dusty aromas of yellow apple and cream soda are creamier than the palate, which is tangy, lemony and green. This tastes of briny citrus and green apple, while tangerine, lime and green-herb flavors define the finish.
Refined-description: Dusty aroma yellow apple cream soda creamier palate tangy lemony green This taste briny citrus green apple tangerine lime greenherb flavor define finish

description: Plum and berry aromas are lively and come with a mild scent of animal fur. This blend of four grapes, led by Tempranillo, feels blocky and loosely defined, while flavors of plum, raspberry and a touch of herbal green finish spicy and woody. Will function best as an everyday wine.
Refined-description: Plum berry aroma lively come mild scent animal fur This blend four grape led Tempranillo feel blocky loosely defined flavor plum raspberry touch herbal green finish spicy woody Will function best everyday wine

description: Cidery aromas vie with bready notes to give the bouquet complexity. This feels zesty, juicy and citric, with a lean, racy body. Apple cider, green herb, lime and scallion flavors finish with a lasting taste of lime.
Refined-description: Cidery aroma vie bready note give bouquet complexity This feel zesty juicy citric lean racy body Apple cider green herb lime scallion flavor finish lasting taste lime

description: Aromas of blue flowers, forest floor and red berry lead the nose on this straightforward red. A blend of 80% Sangiovese, with 20% Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, the smooth, accessible palate offers red cherries, strawberries and anise alongside bright acidity.
Refined-description: Aromas blue flower forest floor red berry lead nose straightforward red A blend 80 Sangiovese 20 Merlot Cabernet Sauvignon smooth accessible palate offer red cherry strawberry anise alongside bright acidity

description: This unoaked, Dijon-clone wine is lively and lush, with tongue-coating fruit. Melon, banana and papaya flavors steer it in a tropical direction, with a lick of mineral and phenolic bite giving further support.
Refined-description: This unoaked Dijonclone wine lively lush tonguecoating fruit Melon banana papaya flavor steer tropical direction lick mineral phenolic bite giving support

description: Stripped-back cherry and raspberry flavors take on a jammy character with airing. This is tight, bright and mildly acidic on the palate, with raspberry, red plum and brown sugar flavors. Toast and a molasses-like sweetness carry an otherwise juicy finish.
Refined-description: Strippedback cherry raspberry flavor take jammy character airing This tight bright mildly acidic palate raspberry red plum brown sugar flavor Toast molasseslike sweetness carry otherwise juicy finish

description: Soft and earthy, this wine's herbal, funky nature suggests Carneros as much as Sonoma Coast, with black tea and crunchy dried cranberry lurking on the back of the palate. Medium in weight, it eases into a mellow finish.
Refined-description: Soft earthy wine herbal funky nature suggests Carneros much Sonoma Coast black tea crunchy dried cranberry lurking back palate Medium weight eas mellow finish

description: Here is a well-focused wine with appealing toastiness as soon as it's opened. Fruit flavors are still tight, but unfold into tangy raspberry. It spent 18 months in half new French oak, to good effect.
Refined-description: Here wellfocused wine appealing toastiness soon opened Fruit flavor still tight unfold tangy raspberry It spent 18 month half new French oak good effect

description: Blackberry, cherry and earthy aromas are backed by a secondary wave of oaky char. This is 80% Garnacha and 20% Carignan with raw clamp to the palate created by grabby tannins and tomatoey acidity. Briny raspberry and plum flavors finish with rubbery tannins and related grab. This is a tough wine but one with lots of life and power. Drink through 2019.
Refined-description: Blackberry cherry earthy aroma backed secondary wave oaky char This 80 Garnacha 20 Carignan raw clamp palate created grabby tannin tomatoey acidity Briny raspberry plum flavor finish rubbery tannin related grab This tough wine one lot life power Drink 2019

description: Closed on the nose at first, this wine reventualy reveals black currant and cassis around wrapped tobacco leaf, the midpalate somewhat dry and puckering in tannin. Concentrated and dense, it finishes in dusty mocha.
Refined-description: Closed nose first wine reventualy reveals black currant cassis around wrapped tobacco leaf midpalate somewhat dry puckering tannin Concentrated dense finish dusty mocha

description: This is a bold, ripe wine that is full of black fruits and generous tannins. It has a rich, warm character that is tempered by acidity and a crisp black currant aftertaste. Drink now.
Refined-description: This bold ripe wine full black fruit generous tannin It rich warm character tempered acidity crisp black currant aftertaste Drink

description: This wine starts off a bit tarry or rubbery, but with airing that dissipates to reveal a dry, savory, complex rosé. It's a blend of Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre that builds in layers of texture from chalky to silky on the finish.
Refined-description: This wine start bit tarry rubbery airing dissipates reveal dry savory complex rosé It blend Syrah Grenache Mourvèdre build layer texture chalky silky finish

description: Chunky and fleshy, this is loaded with spicy pear and lighter melon and tangerine fruits. Full, forward and fresh, it's delicious and ready to go.
Refined-description: Chunky fleshy loaded spicy pear lighter melon tangerine fruit Full forward fresh delicious ready go

description: This is a satisfying, ripe and rich wine. It has big layers of red fruits, attractive spice from partial wood aging and fresh acidity. Still young, it will be even better from early 2016.
Refined-description: This satisfying ripe rich wine It big layer red fruit attractive spice partial wood aging fresh acidity Still young even better early 2016

description: Made from a majority of Cabernet Franc, complemented with a small handful of Merlot, the wine is aged in new French oak half barrels. Tannic and savory in cassis and cranberry, the wine also shows a trace of black tea and tomato leaf. The wine's oak remains extremely pronounced, which suggests some time in cellar, through 2020.
Refined-description: Made majority Cabernet Franc complemented small handful Merlot wine aged new French oak half barrel Tannic savory cassis cranberry wine also show trace black tea tomato leaf The wine oak remains extremely pronounced suggests time cellar 2020

description: Pure Négrette produces a smooth, black cherry and red berry-flavored wine. Light hints of wood from aging in big barrels have helped to give the wine a rich and spicy character. This is further enhanced by black-fruit acidity that adds a fresh streak to this warm, ripe wine. Drink now.
Refined-description: Pure Négrette produce smooth black cherry red berryflavored wine Light hint wood aging big barrel helped give wine rich spicy character This enhanced blackfruit acidity add fresh streak warm ripe wine Drink

description: Apple, peach and melon aromas are fresh and easy to like. This has a pure palate, with citric and malic acidity offset by pulpy weight. Peach and apricot flavors finish long, and overall this should maintain its good shape over the next year.
Refined-description: Apple peach melon aroma fresh easy like This pure palate citric malic acidity offset pulpy weight Peach apricot flavor finish long overall maintain good shape next year

description: Rubbery, somewhat funky aromas shift toward iodine and stewed blackberry. A dense palate houses rubbery tannins that are short on structure. Baked blackberry, plum and cassis flavors finish toasty, herbal, leathery and salty.
Refined-description: Rubbery somewhat funky aroma shift toward iodine stewed blackberry A dense palate house rubbery tannin short structure Baked blackberry plum cassis flavor finish toasty herbal leathery salty

description: A hearty blend of Merlot and Cabernet, this opens with aromas of cedar, vanilla, underbrush and black currant. The warm, one-dimensional palate delivers dried black cherries, raisins, tobacco and anisette alongside velvety tannins. You'll also get the heat of alcohol that dominates the finish.
Refined-description: A hearty blend Merlot Cabernet open aroma cedar vanilla underbrush black currant The warm onedimensional palate delivers dried black cherry raisin tobacco anisette alongside velvety tannin You also get heat alcohol dominates finish

description: Made entirely from Tempranillo—a rarity in Italy—this opens with aromas of blue flowers, plum and a whiff of leather. The smooth palate delivers dried cherry and prune, accented by ground pepper and oak-driven spices. Bracing but fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity provide support. Drink through 2018.
Refined-description: Made entirely Tempranillo—a rarity Italy—this open aroma blue flower plum whiff leather The smooth palate delivers dried cherry prune accented ground pepper oakdriven spice Bracing finegrained tannin fresh acidity provide support Drink 2018

description: Green bell pepper and cedar aromas lead the nose of this easy-drinking blend of Syrah, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. The aromas carry over to the fresh palate, along with black currants and black cherries. Supple tannins support the juicy flavors.
Refined-description: Green bell pepper cedar aroma lead nose easydrinking blend Syrah Merlot Cabernet Sauvignon The aroma carry fresh palate along black currant black cherry Supple tannin support juicy flavor

description: This ripe, tannic wine has a good sense of balance between the firm structure and the potential of the rich, full-blown fruit. Blackberry fruit shows strongly, giving a dense wine that will still develop quickly. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: This ripe tannic wine good sense balance firm structure potential rich fullblown fruit Blackberry fruit show strongly giving dense wine still develop quickly Drink 2016

description: Mocha toffee and raspberry liqueur provide an alluring entry into this wine, before it evolves into soft layers of blackberry and black currant. Medium to full-bodied, this has thick, dry tannins that stay prominent through the finish.
Refined-description: Mocha toffee raspberry liqueur provide alluring entry wine evolves soft layer blackberry black currant Medium fullbodied thick dry tannin stay prominent finish

description: Made from the native grape Pugnitello, this hearty red opens with aromas of dried Mediterranean herbs, scorched earth, allspice and overripe black fruit. The warm, forward palate doles out baked plum, ripe blackberries, blue flowers, clove and the heat of evident alcohol. Velvety tannins wrap around the palate, but the dominant alcohol throws it off balance and gives it a monolithic character.
Refined-description: Made native grape Pugnitello hearty red open aroma dried Mediterranean herb scorched earth allspice overripe black fruit The warm forward palate dole baked plum ripe blackberry blue flower clove heat evident alcohol Velvety tannin wrap around palate dominant alcohol throw balance give monolithic character

description: Showing a slightly coppery blush hue, this softly aromatic wine has a pleasing muskiness. It's high acid, slightly spritzy, clean and fresh. Though perfectly quaffable, it's not a typical Oregon Pinot Gris.
Refined-description: Showing slightly coppery blush hue softly aromatic wine pleasing muskiness It high acid slightly spritzy clean fresh Though perfectly quaffable typical Oregon Pinot Gris

description: Fruity and forward, with a spritzy mouthfeel, this is like a bowl of cherries, with a cherry candy finish. Highlights of orange and grapefruit come through also. Drink now through 2016.
Refined-description: Fruity forward spritzy mouthfeel like bowl cherry cherry candy finish Highlights orange grapefruit come also Drink 2016

description: The vineyard was planted in the early 1970s, and this wine shows some old-vine complexity. It's an elegant drink, with a nicely finessed fruit and acid balance. Light and clean flavors suggest watermelon and raspberry with a hint of cherry.
Refined-description: The vineyard planted early 1970s wine show oldvine complexity It elegant drink nicely finessed fruit acid balance Light clean flavor suggest watermelon raspberry hint cherry

description: This is not as light on the palate as the low alcohol reading might suggest. The raspberry and strawberry fruit carries aromas and flavors of composted earth. It's an interesting wine, and offers good value in a Willamette Valley Pinot.
Refined-description: This light palate low alcohol reading might suggest The raspberry strawberry fruit carry aroma flavor composted earth It interesting wine offer good value Willamette Valley Pinot

description: Scheurebe, a Riesling hybrid common in Germany and Austria, is a rare find stateside, particularly in dry styles. Zesty lime pith and pineapple flavors are brisk and revitalizing in this light-bodied sip. A touch of fresh herbs and white-tea astringency lend nuance to the crisp finish.
Refined-description: Scheurebe Riesling hybrid common Germany Austria rare find stateside particularly dry style Zesty lime pith pineapple flavor brisk revitalizing lightbodied sip A touch fresh herb whitetea astringency lend nuance crisp finish

description: With vines in the northeast of the Gers region, this winery produces impressively ripe red wines. This wood-aged and spicy wine is still young and needs time to integrate the wood with the red berry fruits. It does have weight and potential richness, so give it until 2016.
Refined-description: With vine northeast Gers region winery produce impressively ripe red wine This woodaged spicy wine still young need time integrate wood red berry fruit It weight potential richness give 2016

description: Earthy aromas of dried herbs, forest floor and freshly felled fennel shrubs emerge form this blend from the now William Foley-owned Firestone brand. Warm cherries and tart acidity make for a nice blend of fruit and complexity on the palate.
Refined-description: Earthy aroma dried herb forest floor freshly felled fennel shrub emerge form blend William Foleyowned Firestone brand Warm cherry tart acidity make nice blend fruit complexity palate

description: A soft and rounded wine, it's ripe, full in the mouth and warm in character. A steely edge merges with the ripe apple and pear flavors to give a wine that's rich and ready to drink.
Refined-description: A soft rounded wine ripe full mouth warm character A steely edge merges ripe apple pear flavor give wine rich ready drink

description: Very dry, with a firm mineral content, this rosé really needs food. Fresh red currant and raspberry fruitiness are surrounded by tannins and tight acidity. Drink by 2015.
Refined-description: Very dry firm mineral content rosé really need food Fresh red currant raspberry fruitiness surrounded tannin tight acidity Drink 2015

description: Ripe and smooth, this is a rich, rounded wine that has a warm character, tasting of sunshine. With soft tannins, a touch of caramel from the wood aging and layers of black fruits, it's an attractive wine to drink now, or age until 2017.
Refined-description: Ripe smooth rich rounded wine warm character tasting sunshine With soft tannin touch caramel wood aging layer black fruit attractive wine drink age 2017

description: Jammy cassis, blackberry and foxy aromas define the nose on this lush, almost ponderous blend of Malbec, Bonarda and Petit Verdot. There's flatness to the palate along with flavors of blackbery, plum and dark, minty oak. A heavy, grabby finish is bold and voluminous.
Refined-description: Jammy cassis blackberry foxy aroma define nose lush almost ponderous blend Malbec Bonarda Petit Verdot There flatness palate along flavor blackbery plum dark minty oak A heavy grabby finish bold voluminous

description: This is rather subdued but after ample time in the glass it reveals aromas of oak, toast, espresso and chocolate that continue on to the palate along with vanilla notes. It lacks the vintage's hallmark intensity. Drying tannins give an astringent finish.
Refined-description: This rather subdued ample time glass reveals aroma oak toast espresso chocolate continue palate along vanilla note It lack vintage hallmark intensity Drying tannin give astringent finish

description: Pretty aromas include violet, crushed berries and a balsamic note. But the palate isn't very expressive, offering up raw Morello cherry and espresso notes alongside racy acidity and astringent tannins. Drink after 2020.
Refined-description: Pretty aroma include violet crushed berry balsamic note But palate nt expressive offering raw Morello cherry espresso note alongside racy acidity astringent tannin Drink 2020

description: Old Wente clones drive the richness of this wine, a mix of lemon, oak and fennel, with a touch of spice on the finish. A waft of buttered popcorn invites intrigue aromatically, developing into creaminess on the body. Bacigalupi has a history of famous Chardonnay, having provided grapes for Chateau Montelena's winning Chardonnay in the 1976 Paris Tasting.
Refined-description: Old Wente clone drive richness wine mix lemon oak fennel touch spice finish A waft buttered popcorn invite intrigue aromatically developing creaminess body Bacigalupi history famous Chardonnay provided grape Chateau Montelena winning Chardonnay 1976 Paris Tasting

description: There's a mix of herbal aromas and raisin on this blend of Malbec, Merlot, Cab Sauvignon and Syrah. In the mouth, it's edgy and rubbery, with rock-hard tannins. Flavors of baked black fruits, tobacco and citrus peel finish raw and rubbery. This will need a lot of air and also hearty  food to show its better side.
Refined-description: There mix herbal aroma raisin blend Malbec Merlot Cab Sauvignon Syrah In mouth edgy rubbery rockhard tannin Flavors baked black fruit tobacco citrus peel finish raw rubbery This need lot air also hearty food show better side

description: A penetrating whiff of wintergreen is the first impression of this aromatic young wine. The tightly-wound fruit brings cranberry and tart plum flavors into focus, followed by a lick of dark chocolate running through stiff tannins.
Refined-description: A penetrating whiff wintergreen first impression aromatic young wine The tightlywound fruit brings cranberry tart plum flavor focus followed lick dark chocolate running stiff tannin

description: This is a firmly wood-aged wine, full of spice and burnt toast flavors. They leave little room for the berry fruits at the moment. It is structured, a statement wine with its heavy bottle, and needing time to round out. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: This firmly woodaged wine full spice burnt toast flavor They leave little room berry fruit moment It structured statement wine heavy bottle needing time round Drink 2016

description: This is a rich, broad-shouldered Pinot Noir, woodsy and oaky with a firm and fierce grip on the palate. It leans more toward earth and smoke than exuberant fruit. Textured in soft undertones of silk, it also offers plenty of fresh herb, a component to take advantage of in pairing.
Refined-description: This rich broadshouldered Pinot Noir woodsy oaky firm fierce grip palate It lean toward earth smoke exuberant fruit Textured soft undertone silk also offer plenty fresh herb component take advantage pairing

description: A delicate, almost fragile wine, this opens with tart fruit flavors of strawberry and red plum. There's more than enough acidity, smooth tannins, and a graceful flow to the wine, ending with a light dusting of cocoa.
Refined-description: A delicate almost fragile wine open tart fruit flavor strawberry red plum There enough acidity smooth tannin graceful flow wine ending light dusting cocoa

description: This is a rich and jammy wine, packed with black fruits as well as dark tannins. Dark chocolate flavors come from the wood aging which also leaves a burnt taste. These both suggest this potentially fine wine needs to age. Drink from 2016.
Refined-description: This rich jammy wine packed black fruit well dark tannin Dark chocolate flavor come wood aging also leaf burnt taste These suggest potentially fine wine need age Drink 2016

description: Even with some hours of breathing time, this remains tight and tannic, with compact flavors of black cherry hard candy. A streak of cola is highlighted with brown spices. The wine loses momentum in the finish, which thins out and quickly fades.
Refined-description: Even hour breathing time remains tight tannic compact flavor black cherry hard candy A streak cola highlighted brown spice The wine loses momentum finish thins quickly fade

description: Loaded with scents and flavors of chocolate, mocha and buttered toast, this forward and very pretty wine surrounds a light core of strawberry and cherry fruit. It's polished—even silky—and very tasty, though without the depth and complexity for long-term aging.
Refined-description: Loaded scent flavor chocolate mocha buttered toast forward pretty wine surround light core strawberry cherry fruit It polished—even silky—and tasty though without depth complexity longterm aging

description: Aromas of stone fruits and citrus are dusty and nice; so is the mouthfeel, which is fresh but shows texture and body. Watermelon, nectarine and citrus flavors finish slightly bitter but within reason.
Refined-description: Aromas stone fruit citrus dusty nice mouthfeel fresh show texture body Watermelon nectarine citrus flavor finish slightly bitter within reason

description: Despite being nine years old, this comes across young and jammy, with foxy aromas of wild berries and animal fur. The palate is blocky, heavily extracted and fully ripe in feel. Flavors of prune and blackberry finish with hard tannins. Drink or hold.
Refined-description: Despite nine year old come across young jammy foxy aroma wild berry animal fur The palate blocky heavily extracted fully ripe feel Flavors prune blackberry finish hard tannin Drink hold

description: This Barolo has a somewhat raw quality, delivering sensations of tart red cherry, black pepper, sage, coffee bean and bitter chocolate. The bracing tannins are astringent and overpowering at this stage. Try it after 2020.
Refined-description: This Barolo somewhat raw quality delivering sensation tart red cherry black pepper sage coffee bean bitter chocolate The bracing tannin astringent overpowering stage Try 2020

description: Stewed tomato, graphite and mushrooms in a brown sauce lead the aromas on this single-vineyard offering from downtown Santa Barbara-based winemaker Ryan Carr. The tomatoes continue on the palate, alongside cran-raisin juice.
Refined-description: Stewed tomato graphite mushroom brown sauce lead aroma singlevineyard offering downtown Santa Barbarabased winemaker Ryan Carr The tomato continue palate alongside cranraisin juice

description: This wine has an unusual combination of sweet and sour sensations that include ripe plum, sour cherry, vanilla, dark chocolate, hay, dill, sage and leather. It's still very young with nervous acidity and aggressive tannins that need time to tame.
Refined-description: This wine unusual combination sweet sour sensation include ripe plum sour cherry vanilla dark chocolate hay dill sage leather It still young nervous acidity aggressive tannin need time tame
